title: Mjukvaruutvecklare inom Machine Vision
description:
Om Mabema AB
  
Mabema grundades 2002 och är Sveriges ledande leverantör av visionsystem. Med kameror, lasrar och bildbehandling både med och utan AI avsynar, kontrollerar, mäter och lokaliserar vi komponenter som tillverkas i fabriker. Vi har över 700 installerade system som tillsammans tar över 300 miljoner bilder dagligen. Våra kunder är ofta globala ledande företag inom tillverkningsindustrin eller deras underleverantörer i branscher som fordon, verkstad, läkemedel, skog, livsmedel och ammunition.
  
Vi är ett lönsamt tillväxtbolag med idag26 anställda tillsammans med några konsulter. Hos oss blir du en del av ett härligt, glatt gäng och en kultur som präglas av hjälpsamhet, omtanke och korta beslutsvägar.
  
Om rollen
  
Vårt affärsområde AMMO fokuserar på utveckling och tillverkning av inspektionsmaskiner för ammunitionstillverkning, där produkten "InSpec" är en av våra mest innovativa och framgångsrika lösningar.
  
Som utvecklare hos Mabema kommer du att spela en avgörande roll i utvecklingen av mjukvaran och bildbehandlingsalgoritmerna för våra inspektionsmaskiner inom affärsområdet AMMO. Tillsammans med vår produktansvarige och övriga i utvecklingsteamet kommer du att driva utvecklingen av avancerade bildbehandlingssystem, där AI-algoritmer förväntas bli en allt viktigare komponent.
  
Du bör vara en problemlösare med analytisk förmåga och ha erfarenhet av att planera och genomföra komplexa projekt, både självständigt och i team.
  
Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter
  
Utveckla och underhålla mjukvara i C# för inspektionsmaskiner.
  
Utveckla och optimera bildbehandlingsalgoritmer för maskiner inom AMMO.
  
Utforska och implementera AI-algoritmer för att lösa komplexa bildbehandlingsproblem.
  
Samarbeta med utvecklingsteamet för att säkerställa kvalitet och funktionalitet i mjukvaran.
  
Delta i testning, felsökning och driftsättning av mjukvarulösningar.
  
Bidra till teamets gemensamma planering och utförande av projekt.
  
  

Kvalifikationer
  
Minst 5 års erfarenhet av programmering. Vi programmerar i huvudsak i C#.
  
Erfarenhet av bildbehandling och/eller visionsystem är starkt meriterande.
  
Kunskap inom AI, särskilt för bildbehandling, är meriterande.
  
M.Sc. inom datavetenskap, teknisk fysik eller liknande.
  
God förmåga att planera och organisera både eget arbete och gemensamma teamuppgifter.
  
Mycket goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska.
  
Problemlösande och analytisk med ett strukturerat arbetssätt.
  
  

Personliga egenskaper
  
Ordningssinne och strukturerad arbetssätt.
  
Trivs med att arbeta i ett litet, sammansvetsat team i ett expansivt företag.
  
Idérik och innovativ med förmåga att omsätta idéer till fungerande lösningar.
  
Förmåga att arbeta självständigt samtidigt som du har en god samarbetsförmåga.
  
  

Vad vi erbjuder
  
Hos Mabema får du möjlighet att arbeta i en innovativ och expansiv miljö med stort inflytande över projektens utformning och genomförande. Vi sätter stort värde på personalens innovationsförmåga och engagemang, som är avgörande för att skapa det verkliga värdet i våra produkter. Vi erbjuder en arbetsplats där du kan utvecklas både professionellt och personligt, och där dina insatser kommer att ha direkt påverkan på våra produkters framgång.
  
Välkommen att bli en del av Mabema och bidra till utvecklingen av vår framgångsrika produktportfölj.
  
Ansök
  
Vi ser fram emot att höra från dig!
  
**Plats:** Linköping
  
**Omfattning:** Heltid

title: Android Developer
description:
**At Hemnet, you’ll join a small, supportive Android community that thrives on collaboration and continuous learning. We work with a modern Android stack and give the freedom to introduce the latest improvements in Android development to the project. Whether you’re passionate about UX, app architecture, or improving developer tooling, there’s room to grow and specialise in what you enjoy working on.**

As Android Developer, you will work in one of our product development teams as well as play a big role in our App community consisting of 6 Android Developers and 8 iOS Developers working daily in creating a crisp and delightful UI for our users. You will contribute to all stages in the product life cycle: design, implementation, testing, deployment and maintenance. Together with us you will have the ability to create a big impact on what we build and how we build it, as each team is in control of their own product decisions.


We work with a data-driven approach in close collaboration with each other - exploring, testing and iterating. Thanks to our large amount of traffic, we quickly validate against real data and learn from new insights.  

  

**What you will do**

* Create high-quality and robust features, owning the development process from planning to final delivery and follow up.
* Work closely with passionate and experienced product managers, designers, and other engineers with different backgrounds to plan and ensure high-quality results.
* Be an active participant in the App Community and wider product development team at Hemnet.
* Proactively improve the product by fixing, maintaining, organising and automating.

**Who are you?**  

  

To become successful in this position we believe that you are up to date with the latest Native Android tooling and development. You also enjoy knowledge sharing and learning together, putting extra effort into code reviews (which also makes work more fun). With an eye for design, you always strive to create simple and easy-to-understand solutions. You have experience working with consumer facing apps focusing on external users. We also believe you have worked with different kinds of release processes and truly believe in the value of automated testing.

 **Here’s a peek at our stack:**


Kotlin


Jetpack Compose


Coroutines and Flow


Git


Unidirectional Data Flow architecture (UDF)


Compose navigation


UI, Compose and unit tests


Continuous Integration

 **What we offer**

  

We have a beautiful office next to Hötorget, a hybrid-remote work setup, 30 days of holiday plus 4 YOLO days, paid workouts, running classes/races, flexible working hours, as well as everything else to make you feel safe such as pension benefits, parental leave top-up and health insurance. Here’s our full benefit package

  

We have a culture of sharing including lab weeks twice a year, Friday demos, dev brekkies and brown bags.


Hemnet is a place where you can be yourself and have fun with others. We actively encourage you to explore and share your other passions – whether it's producing music, painting or playing with clay.

 **Your career at Hemnet**  

With over 40 million visits each month, you’ll be part of Sweden’s most popular property platform – and one of the world’s most admired real estate platforms. But our size and reputation aren’t the only reasons why you and your 150+ colleagues enjoy working here.


Since 1998, Hemnet has been an essential go-to place for millions of Swedes, guiding them through one of life’s biggest transitions: finding a new place to call home. We’re proud to make this life-changing, often stressful journey as seamless as possible.


With access to vast amounts of data, you’ll have limitless opportunities to explore and create new features that enhance the experience for Sweden’s real estate agents, home buyers, and sellers.  

  

Our friendly Hemnet culture fosters a dynamic, playful environment where every voice is valued. Here, you’ll join a welcoming team that encourages you to thrive and grow, working alongside passionate colleagues from around the world.  

  

**A Hybrid Way of Working**

title: SAP-utvecklare
description:
**Assignment: SAP ABAP Cloud Developer with RAP – S/4HANA Greenfield Implementation**  

**Location:** Remote (with occasional travel within Sweden)  

**Start Date:** As soon as possible  

**Scope:** Full-time  

**Duration:** Initially 7 months (extension possible)  

**Language:** English

**Assignment Overview:**  

We are looking for an experienced SAP developer with deep expertise in ABAP Cloud and the Restful Application Programming Model (RAP) to contribute to an ongoing greenfield implementation project based on S/4HANA. The assignment includes both backend and frontend development within a modern SAP landscape, with a strong focus on clean core principles and user-friendly interfaces via Fiori and UI5.


You will join an international team working in an agile environment to build future-proof solutions on the SAP Business Technology Platform.

**Key Responsibilities:**

* Develop business logic using ABAP Cloud and RAP
* Create and maintain CDS views and expose services via SAP Gateway
* Design and build user interfaces using Fiori/UI5 and Fiori Elements
* Work with modern development tools such as SAP BAS, Visual Studio Code, and Git
* Collaborate with solution architects and business experts in areas such as Finance, Procurement, and Enterprise Asset Management (EAM)
* Ensure development aligns with clean core architecture in S/4HANA

**Required Skills and Experience:**

* Solid experience in SAP development within S/4HANA environments
* Proven expertise in ABAP Cloud and RAP
* Strong hands-on knowledge of Fiori/UI5 and Fiori Elements
* Experience with CDS views, SAP Gateway, and system integration
* Proficiency using development environments like SAP Business Application Studio (BAS), Visual Studio Code, and Git
* Good understanding of core business processes in S/4HANA – particularly Finance, Procurement, and EAM
* Fluent English communication skills, both spoken and written


This is an excellent opportunity for a skilled SAP professional who wants to work with the latest technologies and contribute to a high-impact S/4HANA transformation in an international context.

 **About** **Rasulson Consulting**

Rasulson Consulting is a specialized staffing and recruitment firm focused on the IT sector. We collaborate with leading tech companies and innovative startups to provide exciting career opportunities for individuals passionate about digital development. With our deep technical expertise and extensive network, we efficiently match the right talents with the right assignments. At Rasulson Consulting, you’ll receive personalized guidance, regular feedback, and the chance to take the next step in your IT career.

title: Senior Embeddedutvecklare
description:

 **Din profil (Skall krav)**  

* Grundläggande förståelse för kommunikationsteori
* Förståelse för trådlösa system och teknik
* Erfarenhet av felsökning och arbete i labbmiljö
* Goda kunskaper i Microsoft Windows/Office och Linux
* Grundläggande nätverkskunskaper
* Utmärkta muntliga och skriftliga kunskaper i engelska
* En bakgrund inom elektroteknik eller ett närliggande ingenjörsområde.
* Gärna fördjupningskurser inom: trådlös kommunikation, RF/mikrovågsteknik, kommunikationssystem.
* Helst vara bekant med RF-komponenter som förstärkare, filter, riktningskopplare med mera.
* Helst ha erfarenhet av RF-instrument som signalgeneratorer och spektrumanalysatorer. Förmåga att arbeta både självständigt och i team.
* Noggrannhet och sinne för detaljer.

  

**Sista ansökningdatum:** 12-05-2025  

  

**Om Deploja**  

Vi sysselsätter idag erfarna konsulter, inom bl.a. Systemutveckling, Test, Arkitektur, IT-Projektledning, IT-Säkerhet.  

  

Att jobba på Deploja är något helt annat än att arbeta på ett vanligt konsultbolag – och det är vi riktigt stolta över. Vad är det då som gör oss unika?

  

Vi erbjuder helt enkelt mer än bara hög lön och större frihet, det är bara början. Hos oss hittar du den arbetsmiljö och de möjligheter du förtjänar. Välkommen till Deploja, där gräset faktiskt är grönare!

 **Vi erbjuder dig följande, Valet är ditt!**


Spännande uppdrag hos våra många kunder. Vi fokuserar på långsiktiga uppdrag, vilket ger dig möjlighet att skapa värde för kunden samtidigt som du utvecklas själv.


En trygg månadslön – tillsammans bestämmer vi en grundlön baserad på dina uppdrag.


Tjänstebil – vi uppmuntrar dig att välja en elbil för en mer hållbar framtid.


Tjänstepension och stora möjligheter till löneväxling.


Semester - Önskar du mer än 30 dagar semester, kanske 60 dagar?


Privat sjukvårdsförsäkring, olycksfallsförsäkring och livförsäkring för ökad trygghet.

  

Kompetensutveckling – du får själv sätta din budget och välja vilka utbildningar du vill delta i.


Livskvalitet - Har du kanske svårt att få ihop pusslet i vardagen och önskar arbeta lite mindre och ändå kunna tjäna lika mycket om inte mer?

 *Vi hanterar ansökningar löpande, med hänsyn till höga arbetstrycket är det extra viktigt med en kort motivering för tjänsten som förklarar hur man möter kraven.*

title: Scala Developer
description:
**Assignment: Scala Developer – Privacy-Focused Data Streaming Solutions**  

**Location:** Södertälje (Hybrid, 2–3 days on-site per week)  

**Start Date:** July 10, 2025  

**End Date:** July 10, 2026  

**Workload:** Full-time  

**Language:** English

**Overview:**  

We are currently seeking an experienced Scala Developer to join a forward-thinking and technically mature team working at the forefront of modern data streaming architectures. This is an opportunity to contribute to the development of scalable and secure digital products where privacy and quality are central to the engineering culture.


The position offers a hybrid working model, with a balance between independent work and close collaboration in a cross-functional agile environment.

**Role Description:**  

You will be a key contributor in a lean, agile team that designs and delivers resilient and well-tested systems built on a modern functional technology stack. The team's focus is on backend development in Scala with an emphasis on event-driven and streaming data architectures. There may also be opportunities to contribute to frontend development using React and TypeScript.


The development process is rooted in test automation, observability, and security-by-design, ensuring that the solutions meet high standards in both reliability and user privacy.

**Responsibilities:**

* Develop and maintain robust backend services using Scala
* Contribute to event-driven architectures with tools such as Pekko and Akka
* Collaborate with team members to define and refine requirements, solutions, and technical approaches
* Engage in continuous improvement of test coverage and simulation scenarios
* (Optional) Support full-stack development using React, TypeScript, and gRPC
* Uphold best practices for privacy, security, and observability throughout the development lifecycle

**Desired Skills & Experience:**

* Solid experience with Scala or another functional programming language (with a willingness to transition into Scala)
* Familiarity with or interest in tools like Pekko/Akka and data streaming patterns
* Experience working in small, agile teams with collaborative workflows
* Interest or experience in frontend development with React and web gRPC is a plus
* Comfortable with CI/CD pipelines, containerized deployments, and cloud-native platforms
* Fluent in English, both spoken and written

**Tech Environment:**

* **Languages:** Scala, TypeScript, JavaScript
* **Frontend:** React, Vite
* **Backend Frameworks:** Pekko Actors & Streams, gRPC (web/server)
* **DevOps & Tooling:** GitLab CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes, Gradle (Kotlin DSL), Linux
* **Testing Tools:** ScalaTest, Vitest, Cypress
* **Observability:** OpenTelemetry (tracing, metrics, logging), integrated with Grafana
* **Security:** Strong focus on privacy and security throughout all stages of development


If you're passionate about functional programming, privacy-conscious design, and building resilient systems for real-time data, this role provides a dynamic and rewarding environment to grow your expertise.


Ready to take the next step? Submit your application via our website today.

 **About** **Rasulson Consulting**

title: Software Developer
description:
*Här får du arbeta med långsiktig produktutveckling tillsammans med kompetenta och seniora kollegor. Vi lägger stort fokus på din utveckling och du får en skräddarsydd utvecklingsplan som passar dig och dina personliga mål. Vi arbetar dessutom utifrån en hybrid arbetsmodell där det finns stort utrymme för flexibilitet. Välkommen till oss på CAB!*

**Att vara utvecklare på CAB**
------------------------------

  

På CAB arbetar vi med att kontinuerligt utveckla vår DevOps eftersom vi tycker att det är viktigt att våra utvecklingsteam får följa resultatet av de produkter de arbetar med, över tid. Som utvecklare är du alltså delaktig i hela utvecklingskedjan, från kravställning och design till färdig produkt. Du och ditt team ansvarar för produkten under hela dess livscykel.

  

Dessutom är vi väldigt förtjusta i att arbeta med teknik i framkant och har en Microsoftbaserad utvecklingsmiljö där vi främst använder:

* .NET och C#
* Webbramverket Blazor
* Kubernetesmiljö


Du blir en del av organisationen Product Development Healthcare, som består av utvecklingsteam i både Norge och Sverige. Du får arbeta med produkter som gör skillnad för både vårdpersonal och patienter. Vi är på en spännande tillväxtresa där vi bygger en nordisk plattform som frigör administrativ tid för vårdpersonal, vilket ger dem utrymme att fokusera på sitt uppdrag: att ge omsorg.

**När du utvecklas, utvecklas vi!**
-----------------------------------


Självklart är det även viktigt att du får tid att utvecklas och ta dig an ny kunskap, därför lägger vi stort fokus på din kompetensutveckling. Vi tror det mesta kommer ske i det dagliga arbetet där du omges av kompetenta och ambitiösa kollegor som gärna delar med sig av sin kunskap och som vill lära sig av dig. Dessutom tror vi på en sund balans mellan jobb och fritid där det finns stort utrymme för flexibilitet.


Utöver din dagliga kompetensutveckling kommer du, tillsammans med din chef, att ta fram en skräddarsydd utvecklingsplan som passar dig och dina personliga mål. Här ingår bland annat:

  

* Kompetensutveckling via utvecklarkonferenser eller liknande forum.
* CAB Tech Talk - en seminarieserie där du som utvecklare har möjlighet att dela kunskap, den senaste tekniken eller utvecklingslösningar med dina kollegor.
* Kompetensspridning genom mob- eller parprogrammering.

Detta i kombination med en bred produktportfölj skapar förutsättningar för många personliga utvecklingsmöjligheter.

**Klicka här och läs mer om vårt förmånspaket och hur vi strävar efter att alltid vara en riktigt bra arbetsplats!**

**Är du den vi söker?**
-----------------------


Vi söker dig som har jobbat flera år som utvecklare och har goda kunskaper i .NET, C# samt erfarenhet av lösningsarkitektur.


För att trivas i rollen tror vi att du tycker om att ta dig an ny teknik men även dela med dig och bidra till utvecklingen i teamet. Eftersom du arbetar genom hela livscykeln av de produkter du är med och utvecklar så är helhetsperspektiv och ansvarstagande något som känns självklart för dig.

 **Låter det som något för dig? Tveka inte att söka redan idag!**

  

På CAB vill vi ta tillvara de kvalitéer som mångfald tillför verksamheten och välkomnar därför en bredd av sökande till tjänsten. I vår kompetensbaserade rekryteringsprocess tror vi på devisen ”hire for attitude”. Det är viktigt för oss att veta att du är motiverad och engagerad i ditt arbete samt vad du kan åstadkomma här och nu- och även i framtiden. Kanske knockar du oss med ett ess i rockärmen!

**Urval sker löpande men annonsen har öppet till 28/5.**


Har du frågor kring tjänsten är du välkommen att kontakta Julia Lindmark, tfn 070-615 84 06 eller julia.lindmark@cab.se.


I alla våra rekryteringar genomför vi bakgrundskontroll på slutkandidat.

title: Backend Developer

title: Backend Developer
description:

**Our Perks & Benefits**

We are proud to be a non-smoking organization, fostering a healthy and supportive environment for all our team members.

 *Seize this opportunity!* Apply today, as we'll close the job ad once we've discovered our candidate. Don't miss your chance to be part of something extraordinary.

title: Backend developer
description:
We are looking for senior backend engineers to join us and expand our team of talented backend developers. You share a passion for building systems that delivers high business value without sacrificing maintainability, availability, scalability and quality. You will work on the backend systems that power our casino platform and help us deliver the best customer experience.
   

  

**Job Description**
* Design, develop and help operate our systems
* Drive technical improvements throughout the stack
* Together with product teams deliver the best games and business solutions
* Help scale our solution to customer requirements and business opportunities


 Who you are
   

  

* You have 5+ years of experience working in a mixed Java, SQL, Javascript environment
* Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent
* You are passionate about working in an environment of continuous learning
* You are curious, driven and not afraid to take charge and improve the system and add automation where needed
* Taking on technical challenges and solving them is something you take pride in
* You have experience from working on large Java systems and have a solid understanding of performance, scalability and availability challenges of distributed systems
* Quality, not only of the code you write, but the delivered system is important to you
* You thrive in an environment where you are responsible for your code and takes ownership of the change from editor to production system
* You know your way around a modern Unix/Linux system
* Experience with modern deployment, monitoring and logging solutions


 Who we are
   

  

 We are the best and fastest growing slot provider in the world with the operator and product in focus, and the mobile future on our minds. Nolimit is a team of experienced professionals from the gambling industry in Stockholm, Sweden, Malta and Gurugram, India. Our company has derived from hands on work at some of the most successful gambling software providers and operators over the last 15 years. Our mission is to offer a fast, reliable and flexible team that cooperates with the best operators in the world, taking gambling to the next level.
   

  

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. Since we have our own platform, this allows us to deliver special features and smooth, customizable marketing campaigns that are tailored to the operator's specific needs. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.
   

  

 Send your application to hr@nolimitcity.com

title: Senior Software Engineer
description:
Development at Nolimit City (part of Evolution AB) is a challenging and exciting role where you will be part of a team dedicated to creating solutions that redefine our industry. By working in small, highly collaborative teams, you and your team will have clear ownership of one of our most important new initiatives.
   

  

 At Nolimit City, we optimize for quality, fast flows, and iterative development with short feedback loops. We have a strong focus on end-to-end ownership, continuous improvement, monitoring, and experimentation. We strive to have teams that are inclusive, helpful, and have a strong sense of ownership for what they build. Our engineers make some of the most significant decisions for the company, and we are looking for open and curious developers. As part of the Nolimit City team, you will be part of one of Sweden's fastest-growing companies and contribute to creating value for our players worldwide.

* Work with large-scale, highly available, and robust modern systems.
* Be an integral part of a team and its culture and ways of working.

 We have a clean code high performance modern mini/micro service portable system platform for mobile and desktop that is 100 % under our own control. We think it's time for a new angle to the gambling software industry – one where the product is in focus and we fully engage their promotion, marketing and country manager system/activities with our games. Nolimit work with customers on a global scale and the largest gambling operators in the world have our games everywhere.
   

  

 Nolimit City, Stockholm based development team. We provide you with your choice of OS and IDE.

title: Software Engineer
description:
****More independence, freedom, and better pay****
 Coody believes in combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 It's not rocket science.
   

  

 Overpaid managers, fancy offices, and heavily burdened organizations are history.
   

  

 The tech talent of tomorrow deserves a new, independent, and well-paid standard.
   

  

 Welcome to what we call Gravity Free Consulting.
   

  

****Why Coody****
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a slimmed and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no luxurious conferences. But, what does this mean in practice?
   

  

**Maximized Compensation** 
 - Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 - No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security** 
 - Fixed salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shaping the Future** 
 - Projects and assignments for digital game changes like Mojang, Spotify, Volumental, Volvo Cars, Varjo, Toca Boca, Hemnet, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

****This is Coody****
 We’re a diverse community of ambitious tech people from more than 14 nationalities working on exciting challenges with customers across Sweden, Finland, USA, and the UK in industries ranging from gaming, AR, EV, AI, Medtech and Fintech.
   

  

 Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy. Everything we do, we do to make sure individuals working here can live according to their own priorities and unique ambitions. A consultant-first environment where you have better control over your career.
   

  

 Explore our
 **Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that actually puts consultants first.
   

  

****What you’ll be doing****
 As a Senior Software Engineer at Coody, you’ll be working on challenging and fun assignments for companies that you can be proud to have worked with. You’ll be a key player in designing and building scalable, robust applications in cloud environments, while also contributing to areas like working methods, product strategy, and maintaining a great team spirit.
   

  

 You’ll need to be adaptable and ready to jump headfirst into new environments. We’re all about embracing new challenges as opportunities to grow, so if you thrive in a dynamic setting, this is the place for you. Typically, you’ll work on 1-2 assignments per year.
   

  

****Who you are****
 We’re looking for Software Engineers with
 **5+ years of experience** 
 and a proven track record of delivering real results. If you’ve got the following, you’re probably a great fit:
   

  

* Experience building scalable software in cloud environments
* Expertise in at least one modern programming language like TypeScript, JavaScript, Java, .Net, Golang, Kotlin, Rust, Ruby, Erlang / Elixir, Python (you get the idea), and related frameworks
* A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or something related
* Based in Sweden - You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, or permanent residency
* Fluent in English (spoken and written)


****How to apply****
 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criterias? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Software Engineer
description:
BROMMA has been the leading manufacturer of crane spreaders ever since its formation in the 1960s. Today we have, by far, the highest market share of the world’s spreader suppliers. In fact, our market share is higher than all our competitors’ combined. Today, we manufacture close to 2,000 spreaders of all types every year and our spreaders are currently in use in 99 of the top-100 ports world- wide.
   

  

 BROMMA sales and service network has a wide-reaching footprint. We are present with own sales offices on all continents, and with an extensive network of agents, we are able to support customers in every country in the world.
   

  

 More information about BROMMA can be found on www.bromma.com
   

  

**We're making every move count**
 Are you a motivated and talented Software Developer with a passion for innovation and technology, then this role at Bromma could be the next step in your career!
   

  

 Join the innovative team at Bromma and take the lead in the digitalization of the cargo handling industry as a Software Developer in our Kista, Stockholm office.
   

  

 At Bromma, we offer an inspiring international atmosphere where you can thrive and grow your career. You will work on the full diagnostic lifecycle, from machine to user interface, and develop software for our telematic units, which is a key component in Bromma’s digitalization strategy.
   

  

**Main Tasks And Responsibilities**
 As a Software Developer at Bromma, you will work closely with our R&D Cloud and Diagnostics team, in cooperation with internal stakeholders and external vendors. You will be given great responsibility for the development and maintenance of Bromma’s diagnostic and cloud platforms, including onboard diagnostics, prognostics, and telematics software.
   

  

 Our team has taken a strategic decision to own our platforms and moved all source code in house. This gives you the opportunity to work with interesting and challenging technology, and develop your skills in all technologies included in full stack development. You will be a key contributor to Bromma's digitalization strategy, helping to shape the future of the cargo handling industry.
   

  

**What You'll Need To Succeed**
 We are looking for a talented Software Developer with a focus on cloud-backed development with experience in:
   

  

* DevOps, AWS, PostgreSQL or other DB
* Knowledge in Spring Boot, Node.js
* Linux and C++ or Java
* B.Sc degree or equivalent work experience
* Fluent in Swedish or English, speaking and writing, is a requirement


 Search: Linux, “Backend Developer”, “Software Developer”, “Software Engineer”.
   

  

**You Will Be Part Of**
 We believe in our people as it is our people who really make the difference. We always work in close collaboration with our customers, deliver on our promises and never walk away no matter how big the challenge. We succeed because we do it together. With us, you will have the opportunity to realise your potential and become an important member of our global team.
   

  

**Interested to join?**
 If you are excited about this opportunity, please submit your application by 16th of May, 2025
   

  

 For further information please contact Joel Ek Kanslätt, Manager for R&D Cloud and Diagnostics by phone +46 70 200 04 58 or e-mail: joel.ek.kanslatt@bromma.com.
   

  

 Bromma is part of Kalmar (Nasdaq Helsinki:KALMAR). Kalmar offers a wide range of industry shaping heavy material handling equipment and services to ports and terminals, distribution centres, manufacturing and heavy logistics. Headquartered in Helsinki, Finland, Kalmar operates globally in over 120 countries and employs approximately 5,200 people. In 2023, the company's sales on a carve-out basis totalled approximately EUR 2.0 billion.
   

  

 www.kalmarglobal.com

title: Backend Developer – Node.js & Serverless in Modern Fintech
description:
**Build the backbone of fintech at Advisense**
 Are you a backend developer who thrives on solving complex problems, writing clean, scalable code, and working with meaningful data? At Advisense, we’re building powerful tools to tackle real challenges in compliance, risk, and finance—and we want you on our team.
   

  

 This is your chance to shape a modern fintech platform from the inside, together with a small, skilled, and collaborative team. You'll work in a high-impact environment, where your code directly supports smarter, safer financial systems.
   

  

**What** 
**you’ll do**
 As Part Of Our Internal Tech Team, You’ll Focus On Building Scalable, Secure Backend Services That Power Our Fintech Tools. You’ll
   

  

* Develop serverless functions using Node.js and TypeScript
* Design and maintain cloud-based microservices and RESTful APIs
* Drive test-driven development (TDD) and raise the bar for code quality
* Handle complex data processing for fintech applications
* Collaborate closely with product and engineering to ship real value
* Mentor teammates and help foster a supportive, knowledge-sharing culture


**What** 
**we’re looking for**
 You bring a solid backend foundation, a curious mind, and a drive to build things that matter.
   

  

**Must-haves**
* 2+ years’ professional experience in backend development
* Proficiency in Node.js and TypeScript
* Hands-on experience with serverless architecture
* Strong understanding of microservice design and REST APIs
* Familiarity with TDD and testing best practices
* Strong communication skills and a natural team player


**Nice-to-haves**
* Experience in fintech (e.g. compliance, risk, AML, fraud, payments)
* Worked with Palantir Foundry or similar platforms
* Some experience with React or frontend basics
* Knowledge of Python or Domain-Specific Languages (DSLs)


**Why join Advisense?**
 You’ll be part of a tight-knit team of eight fintech professionals who value trust, autonomy, and continuous learning. We combine a startup mindset with the stability of an established company—giving you room to make an impact without the chaos.
   

  

* Flexible hybrid work model – balance remote and in-office work
* Culture of knowledge sharing and mentorship
* Inclusive, respectful environment where your voice matters
* Real technical challenges that make a difference


**About Advisense**
 Advisense is a leading expert firm in financial law, risk management, and corporate governance, with over 450 employees across Europe.
   

  

 We support financial companies in a constantly evolving regulatory environment and work closely with their business operations, management teams, and boards of directors.
   

  

 We review applications continuously, so don’t wait—apply as soon as you're ready. To stay GDPR-compliant, we only accept applications through our official portal.
   

  

**Let’s** 
**build the future of fintech—together**

title: Game Developer
description:
****More independence, freedom, and better pay****
 Coody believes in combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 It's not rocket science.
   

  

 Overpaid managers, fancy offices, and heavily burdened organizations are history.
   

  

 The tech talent of tomorrow deserves a new, independent, and well-paid standard.
   

  

 Welcome to what we call Gravity Free Consulting.
   

  

****Why Coody****
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a slimmed and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no luxurious conferences. But, what does this mean in practice?
   

  

**Maximized Compensation** 
 - Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 - No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security** 
 - Fixed salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shaping the Future** 
 - Projects and assignments for digital game changes like Mojang, Spotify, Volumental, Volvo Cars, Varjo, Toca Boca, Hemnet, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

****This is Coody****
 We’re a diverse community of ambitious tech people from more than 14 nationalities working on exciting challenges with customers across Sweden, Finland, USA, and the UK in industries ranging from gaming, AR, EV, AI, Medtech and Fintech.
   

  

 Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy. Everything we do, we do to make sure individuals working here can live according to their own priorities and unique ambitions. A consultant-first environment where you have better control over your career.
   

  

 Explore our
 **Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that actually puts consultants first.
   

  

****What you’ll be doing****
 As a consultant in Game Development at Coody, you’ll have the opportunity to work with some of the most inspiring digital entertainment companies in the world, in fields such as Games, AR/VR, Music, and other forms of interactive media. You’ll collaborate with cross-functional teams, including developers, designers, artists, producers, and product managers.
   

  

 You’ll need to be adaptable and ready to hit the ground running in new environments. We see every challenge as an opportunity to grow. Typically, you’ll work on 1-2 assignments per year for companies in industries that you’re passionate about.
   

  

****Who you are****
 We’re after talented game developers who love to build immersive experiences and bring ideas to life. You thrive in fast-paced environments, enjoy pushing technical boundaries, and want the freedom to work on exciting projects - without the corporate nonsense.
   

  

* 5+ years of experience in software development.
* Hands-on experience with building games, VR/AR, or similar interactive experiences.
* Solid skills in modern C++, Lua, AngelScript, or web technologies.
* Experience from Unreal Engine (a bonus).
* A relevant degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Game Development, or similar.
* Based in Sweden - You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, or permanent residency.
* Fluent in English (spoken and written)


****How to apply****
 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criterias? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Software Engineer - AI Team | Stockholm
description:
*Are you a skilled Software Developer with expertise in .NET, SQL, and Python? Do you have a passion for building low-latency applications and a knack for A/B testing, end-to-end testing, and monitoring? Are you excited about bridging AI and real-world applications to solve meaningful problems? Join Apotea’s Data and AI team and help us transform e-commerce and digital healthcare through innovative AI and ML solutions!*
**AI + Apotea =**
 Apotea is Sweden’s leading online pharmacy, committed to making healthcare accessible and efficient for everyone. Our Data and AI team is at the heart of innovation, building AI and ML applications that enhance customer experience, streamline operations, and create a foundation for future innovations. By following industry best practices, we develop modern data and AI architectures that deliver value to both the business and our customers.
   

  

**What You’ll Do**
 As a Software Developer in the Data and AI team, you will but not limited to:
   

  

* Design, develop, and maintain high-performance, low-latency applications using .NET, SQL, and Python.
* Conduct A/B testing and end-to-end testing to ensure system reliability and optimize performance.
* Implement and optimize data collection mechanisms on the website to ensure accurate and efficient data capture.
* Implement robust monitoring solutions to proactively detect and resolve issues.
* Collaborate with data engineers, ML engineers, and cross-functional teams to build AI-driven solutions that solve real-world problems.
* Contribute to the development of modern data and AI architectures, ensuring scalability and alignment with industry best practices.
* Play a key role in improving customer experience and operational efficiency through innovative technology.


**Who You Are**
 We think you are a problem-solver with a focus on delivering high-quality, impactful solutions. You are an collaborative team player who can also work independently and have a passionate about learning more about data, AI, and ML, and eager to work closely with experts in these fields and you also have:
   

  

* Proficient in .NET, SQL, and Python, with a strong understanding of software development principles.
* Experienced in A/B testing, end-to-end testing, and monitoring.
* Skilled in building low-latency, high-performance applications.
* Experienced in implementing data collection mechanisms on websites (e.g., tracking user interactions, event logging, and data pipelines).
* Skilled in data modeling, with the ability to design and maintain structured, efficient, and scalable data models.
* Familiar with software architecture principles and capable of making critical tradeoffs in design and implementation.
* Experienced or interested in working with recommendation and search systems (a plus).


**Bonus Points If You Have**
* Experience with cloud platforms like Azure or AWS.
* Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and DevOps practices.
* Familiarity with frontend technologies.
* Experience in e-commerce, logistics, or healthcare systems.


**What Apotea Offer You**
* The chance to work on cutting-edge AI and ML projects that impact millions of customers.
* Join a flat, agile organization with minimal bureaucracy
* Drive sustainability through eco-friendly packaging and logistics
* Opportunities for career growth through training, mentorship, and industry conferences.
* Collaborate in a cross-functional, transparent environment
* Own projects from concept to deployment
* A stable, future-focused company with a meaningful mission to improve healthcare accessibility.


**About Apotea**
 Apotea.se is Sweden’s largest online pharmacy, with the country’s broadest range of over 32,000 non-prescription items and nearly 19,000 prescription drugs for humans and animals. Recognized as Sweden’s most sustainable e-commerce company (Sustainable Brand Index 2021), we simplify everyday life for our customers with fast deliveries and expert advice. In 2024, Apotea reached a turnover of SEK 6.5 billion and currently employs about 1,000 people across Stockholm, Lidingö, and Morgongåva.
   

  

 Apotea is an inclusive employer that values diversity. We welcome all applicants and strive to create a work environment where people, regardless of background, gender, age, religion, or disability, can thrive and grow.
   

  

**The process**
* Apply
* Interview 1: Culture fit
* Interview 2: Technical skills
* Background check: As a pharmacy, we always conduct a background check.
* Potential job offer


**Join Us and Make a Difference -** 
**We hope you want to be a part of our team!**
 Submit your application today—interviews are conducted on an ongoing basis, and the position may be filled immediately. Start date by agreement.
   

  

*Welcome to Apotea – where technology meets health and creates magic!*
 Apotea är Sveriges största nätapotek med fokus på hållbarhet och snabba leveranser. Vår logistik är hjärtat i verksamheten, och vi har som mål att bli Nordens största apotek och Sveriges mest hållbara företag. Tillsammans med våra kunder har vi samlat in över 100 miljoner kronor till välgörenhet, och vi fortsätter att växa varje år – med våra medarbetare som den drivande kraften bakom framgången.

title: Freelance Software Developer (PHP) - AI Tutor
description:
At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.
   

  

**What We Do**
 The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Coding, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.
   

  

 Although every project is unique, you might typically:
   

  

* Generate prompts that challenge AI
* Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers
* Correct the model's responses based on your domain-specific knowledge


**How To Get Started**
 Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.
   

  

**Requirements**
* You have a Master's degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields.
* You have at least 3 years of professional experience with PHP
* Code review experience is a must
* Experience with AI projects is a plus
* Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
* You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Benefits**
**Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
* Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
* Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

title: Senior Java Developer
description:
**Senior Java Developer for Leading iGaming Platform company** 




  





  





  





**About the Company:** 




  





 Our partner is expanding rapidly and is now looking for a Senior Java Developer to strengthen the team. The company develops a technically advanced platform for the iGaming industry and is one of the leading players on the market. It all started with a poker product and has since evolved to include a casino platform used by companies around the world.

 As a Senior Java Developer, you’ll play a key role in backend development and system architecture. You’ll work on scalable, high-performance services and influence how things are built—from technical decisions to ways of working.
 



 While the role is backend-focused, you’ll have the opportunity to contribute to frontend work if you’re interested. You’ll collaborate closely with UX designers, product owners, and fellow developers to deliver clean, maintainable code and real customer value.

title: C# | Senior Software Developer
description:
**Job Description**
 Are you a solution-oriented developer with a passion for writing robust, maintainable code? At Coherent in Järfälla, you'll be part of the team building software that drives state-of-the-art optoelectronic research and high-volume production.
   

  

**About Coherent**
 Coherent Corp. is a global leader in photonics and optoelectronics, operating across 73 sites in 18 countries.
   

  

 At our Järfälla facility, we design and manufacture advanced fiber-optic communication chips used in everything from short-range data centers to long-haul telecom networks. These high-performance solutions are central to cloud services, 5G expansion, and the AI ecosystem.
   

  

 With more than 330 engineers, technicians, and operators, our goal is clear: to lead through innovation and quality.
   

  

 The Role
   

  

 You Will Join a Small, Highly Skilled Team That Develops And Maintains The Software Systems Critical To Our Production Flow. Typical Work Includes
   

  

* Developing in-house applications such as our MES, chip-test infrastructure and service-maintenance tools
* Designing databases and systems, plus implementation, testing and maintenance
* Building CI/CD pipelines and driving automation across the factory
* Collaborating daily with colleagues in R&D, process engineering and operations to design new or improve existing solutions.


 Tech stack
   

  

* C#, .NET / .NET Core (primary)
* WPF and/or Blazor (highly valued)
* SQL Server (design & advanced querying)
* ORM frameworks: Entity Framework, Dapper
* RavenDB or other document databases (nice to have)
* Azure DevOps & CI/CD pipelines


 What you bring
   

  

* MSc/BSc in Computer Science, Engineering Physics or similar
* 5+ years of hands-on C# development
* Solid software-design and debugging skills
* Proficiency in English; Swedish is a plus


 Voices from the Team
   

  

*“It’s a great feeling to come into work every day and collaborate with my team of incredibly skilled, inventive, and ambitious developers. Watching the systems we build genuinely make the whole organization better is immensely rewarding.”*
 Tomas Jonsson – Manager Software Systems Engineering
   

  

*“When I started working here, one of the first feeling I got was that I found my way home. Awesome colleagues, interesting and challenging work.”*
 Mikael Gustavsson – Senior Software Developer
   

  

 Why Coherent?
   

  

 At Coherent, you’ll work at the forefront of technology in a supportive and collaborative environment. Our site in Järfälla combines global innovation with local expertise and a strong sense of community.
   

  

**What We Offer**
* Cutting-edge technology and impactful work
* A diverse, international team
* Opportunities for both technical and leadership development
* A culture built on our ICARE values: Integrity, Collaboration, Accountability, Respect, and Enthusiasm


 Culture Commitment
   

  

 We work hard to ensure adherence to the company’s values (ICARE) in all aspects of your position at Coherent:
   

  

* Integrity – Create an Environment of Trust
* Collaboration – Innovate Through the Sharing of Ideas
* Accountability – Own the Process and the Outcome
* Respect – Recognize the Value in Everyone
* Enthusiasm – Find a Sense of Purpose in Work


 Practical Information
   

  

 Start: As agreed
   

  

 Location: Järfälla – On Site
   

  

 Scope: Full-time
   

  

 Ready to build the next generation of opto-electronic manufacturing tools?
   

  

 Submit your CV and a brief cover letter through our recruitment system.
   

  

 Please note that reference and background checks will be conducted as part of the process.
   

  

**About Us**
 Coherent is a global leader in lasers, engineered materials and networking components. We are a vertically integrated manufacturing company that develops innovative products for diversified applications in the industrial, optical communications, military, life sciences, semiconductor equipment, and consumer markets. Coherent provides a comprehensive career development platform within an environment that challenges employees to perform at their best, while rewarding excellence and hard-work through a competitive compensation program. It's an exciting opportunity to work for a company that offers stability, longevity and growth. Come Join Us!
   

  

**Note to recruiters and employment agencies:** 
 We will not pay for unsolicited resumes from recruiters and employment agencies unless we have a signed agreement and have required assistance, in writing, for a specific opening.

title: Mobile Software Developer
description:
****More independence, freedom, and better pay****
 Coody believes in combining the freedom and flexibility of freelancing with the security of traditional employment.
   

  

 It's not rocket science.
   

  

 Overpaid managers, fancy offices, and heavily burdened organizations are history.
   

  

 The tech talent of tomorrow deserves a new, independent, and well-paid standard.
   

  

 Welcome to what we call Gravity Free Consulting.
   

  

****Why Coody****
 At Coody, we cut out everything unnecessary to give more back to you as a consultant. And we have done it in the package of a slimmed and efficient organization, meaning no overpaid managers, no fancy offices and no luxurious conferences. But, what does this mean in practice?
   

  

**Maximized Compensation** 
 - Typically a +40% salary increase.
   

  

**Freedom & Flexibility** 
 - No bosses. All digital. Fully remote for those who prefer.
   

  

**Employment Security** 
 - Fixed salary, pension, insurance, paid vacation and a big educational fund.
   

  

**Shaping the Future** 
 - Projects and assignments for digital game changes like Mojang, Spotify, Volumental, Volvo Cars, Varjo, Toca Boca, Hemnet, and exciting startups and scaleups.
   

  

****This is Coody****
 We’re a diverse community of ambitious tech people from more than 14 nationalities working on exciting challenges with customers across Sweden, Finland, USA, and the UK in industries ranging from gaming, AR, EV, AI, Medtech and Fintech.
   

  

 Coody is more of a platform than a traditional consultancy. Everything we do, we do to make sure individuals working here can live according to their own priorities and unique ambitions. A consultant-first environment where you have better control over your career.
   

  

 Explore our
 **Employee Handbook** 
 and discover a company that actually puts consultants first.
   

  

****What you’ll be doing****
 As a Mobile Developer Consultant at Coody, you’ll dive into technically challenging and engaging assignments that help companies level up their teams and projects. You’ll be crafting high-quality, efficient, and maintainable code using native or hybrid platforms (such as Android, iOS, React Native, Kotlin Multiplatform or Flutter). You will collaborate close with other engineers, designers, product people and other teams to build mobile experiences for some of the most exciting brands within tech.
   

  

 You’ll need to be adaptable and ready to hit the ground running in new environments. New challenges? Bring them on. We see them as opportunities for growth. Typically, you’ll take on 1-2 different assignments per year. Are you ready to make a difference?
   

  

****Who you are****
 We’re looking for a Mobile Developer with
 **5+ years of experience** 
 and a doer’s mindset. Here’s what we’re after:
   

  

* Strong expertise in either Swift, Kotlin, Flutter or React Native
* Unit testing experience and a solid understanding of the release cycle, and CI/CD
* A degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or Mathematics (or similar)
* Based in Sweden - You must have Swedish citizenship, a valid work visa, or permanent residency
* Fluent in English (spoken and written)


****How to apply****
 Are you excited to take your career to the next level and meet the criteria? Apply now, and we'll be in touch shortly.

title: Experienced Java Developer to Financial Crime Prevention at SEB in Stockholm
description:
*SEB is more than just a bank with an IT function. We are a progressive tech company powered by innovation and fueled by collaboration. From Java to AI and everything in between, we offer you an impressive tech stack and several technology paths. Together we're innovating for a sustainable society and building the tech arena of the future, a welcoming space for everyone.*
 We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Java Developer to join our Financial Crime Prevention division. The successful candidate will play a crucial role in developing and maintaining our Complex Investigation application, which is pivotal in detecting and preventing financial crimes. Are you passionate about using your coding skills to fight financial crime? Join our mission to build cutting-edge solutions that detect and investigate money laundering, fraud, and financial misconduct.
   

  

**About The Role**
 As a Java Developer in the Financial Crime Prevention team, you will be responsible for developing and maintaining new technical capabilities in a smart way to allow us to detect bad actors. Our technical environment consists of but is not limited to Cloud Run, BigQuery and Graph DB. Here you will have a chance to make a difference and work with challenging tasks. You will have great opportunities to both develop and take further steps in your career working within a highly collaborative environment.
   

  

**To thrive in this role, we believe you are/have:** 
  

  

* Extensive experience in Java programming (Spring Boot) in production system
* Hands-on experience with DevOps tools (GitHub CI/CD & Terraform).
* Experience in DBT, Dataform and BigQuery is considered an advantage
* Strong knowledge of microservices, REST APIs.
* Experience with Graph DB such as Neo4j is considered an advantage
* Front-end development with React experience is an advantage
* Analytical mindset and ability to solve complex technical problems
* Passion for challenges that drive your personal development and professional growth


**What We Offer**
 We offer many experiences and benefits to our employees, and there is nuance to every individual’s career experience, but the elements that define the core of our offer are:
   

  

* Hybrid work model, meaning remote work is possible up to 2 days/week
* Extensive training and learning opportunities
* Attractive compensation and benefits
* Access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits
* Opportunities to help transform an industry
* Chances to make an impact on social or environmental issues
* Agile and modern ways of working
* Deliver world-class service to customers


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 To ensure your application gets noticed, apply now! We are constantly reviewing profiles, but no later than 2025-06-25.
   

  

 If you have questions about the position please contact Rasmus Hallberg, Talent Acquisition Partner at rasmus.hallberg@seb.se.
   

  

**Learn more about working at SEB** 
**www.sebgroup.com/career**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.

title: Backend Developer - Platform
description:
At Viaplay Group, we entertain millions of people every day through our streaming services, radio networks, and TV channels. We believe in the power of content not just as a way of telling stories and touching lives, but also expanding worlds.
   

  

 We’re looking for the best people to join us on our journey. Right now, we’re searching for a
 **Backend Developer** 
 in our
 **Stockholm** 
 office – are you ready to hit play on an exciting career change?
   

  

**The role**
 As a Backend Developer at Viaplay, you’ll work on improving and developing our platform to meet the challenges of a continuously growing user base. Your contributions will directly influence how we attract and convert visitors into loyal users of our commercial streaming platform in our Engineering organization. You’ll contribute in building and refining our backend services, as well as supporting our product teams with a seamless user experience by aligning the backend and tooling.
   

  

 We’re modernizing our services to enhance scalability and performance, and you’ll play a key role in driving this transformation. With a cutting-edge serverless architecture built on Node.js, Rust and AWS, you’ll thrive in an innovative and forward-thinking tech environment.
   

  

 You’ll join a newly formed platform team that’s small but mighty, with members in Stockholm and Barcelona. Our mission? To deliver platform solutions that align with both technical and product visions, focusing on the commercial structure of our streaming service.
   

  

**Here’s What Your Daily Challenges Might Look Like**
* Take ownership of technical design, complexity assessment, development, testing, and deployment
* Collaborate with product teams transforming our platform into modern solutions
* Participate in weekly guild meetings, contributing to best practices, long-term strategy, and maintaining technical excellence
* Continuously invest in your personal growth and skill development


**What We’re Looking For**
 We understand you may feel confident ticking certain boxes more than others and that’s why we always keep an open mind in our recruitment process. But, in order to thrive in this role, we do believe you’ll have at least some experience in the following:
   

  

* Developing services using for example, Node.js or Rust
* Strong grasp of object-oriented programming principles
* Familiarity with test-driven or behavior-driven development (TDD/BDD) and related frameworks
* Experience developing services in cloud environments, preferably AWS.
* A track record of contributing to refactoring initiatives in dynamic organization


**It’s a bonus if you have:** 
  

  

* Experience building state-less, high-transactional end-user products.
* Advanced knowledge of AWS services (S3, SQS, Lambda, DynamoDB, etc.


 What we offer you
   

  

* We’ve got you covered! 30 days of paid vacation every year, summer hours, an attractive pension and insurance scheme, and generous parental leave pay lift.
* Your wellbeing matters. We provide you with various wellbeing initiatives including wellness allowance.
* A safe space to grow and up-skill. Our learning culture puts you in the driver’s seat of your own development.
* An innovative environment with Hack Days once a year. This week-long initiative allows you to think outside the box and deliver creative, technical solutions that (more often than not) go on to be implemented, either in our product or our ways of working.
* Entertainment is what we love, and entertainment is what we do. So, unlimited access to Viaplay seems only fair for you to get to know the product – including serier & viewing events, new release movie rentals, linear channels and more.


**Hit play** 
**today**
 If this feels like your kind of challenge, make sure you apply by attaching your CV here – you may also want to add your LinkedIn profile. Please don’t send us your application via email because we won’t be able to accept it. We do, however, welcome any questions you may have about this particular position.
   

  

 Want to learn more about who we are and what we do? Check out our careers page or follow us on Instagram! We’re only ever a few clicks away.

title: Senior Software Engineer - Cloud | SEB, Solna
description:
SEB is a leading northern European financial services group and one of the largest IT employers in the Nordics. Banking is changing rapidly, and we are proud of our reputation for being entrepreneurial and innovative in the face of change. Our brilliant techies work hard to future proof SEB’s digital architecture and customer products because it genuinely makes an enormous impact for our customers and colleagues. Does that sound like a fit for you?
   

  

**About The Role**
 The Custody domain is undergoing a transformation journey to modernize and improve the usability of legacy systems for the rest of the bank & external vendors. Our team builds business applications and service layers between Safekeeping & Post-Trade systems and data consumers to enable modern user-facing applications and new functionality for trading at SEB.
   

  

 We are a team comprised of Data & Software Engineers.
   

  

 Technologies and Concepts we use but are not limited to; GCP, .NET Core, Python, GraphQL, PostgreSQL, GitLab, Terraform, bash
   

  

**To thrive in this role**
 We believe you are a passionate Software Engineer who is self-directed and likes to solve problems with a systematic, but innovative approach.
   

  

**You identify with some of the following disciplines of Software Engineering:**
* DevOps
* Cloud Platform
* Backend/API Development
* Data Engineeri


**What We Offer**
* Entrepreneurial Scandinavian environment
* Hybrid work model, meaning remote work is possible up to 2 days/week
* International opportunities and working environment
* Attractive compensation and access to SEB staff banking with exclusive benefits


**Do you want to be part of SEB?**
 It is our fundamental belief that inclusion and diversity is crucial for our future success. We strive to have an inclusive, value-driven culture where employees feel valued, respected, and involved irrespective of who they are, what they believe or where they come from.
   

  

 Since we select candidates continuously, feel free to send in your application today via the link in this ad, but no later than 23rd of May 2025. If you have questions about the position, please contact Hiring Manager Filip Normann at filip.normann@seb.se, but we will not process applications via email.
   

  

 Please be aware that our final candidates undergo background checks, a process that includes for example identity control, verification of qualifications, credit checks, company engagements and criminal records checks. In some cases, we also apply random drug checks.
   

  

 Learn more about working at SEB on our Career website or through our Career podcasts. https://sebgroup.com/career
   

  

 https://bit.ly/SEBcareer

title: C++ DevOps Developer
description:
**Company Description**
 Technology is our how. And people are our why. For over two decades, we have been harnessing technology to drive meaningful change.
   

  

 By combining world-class engineering, industry expertise and a people-centric mindset, we consult and partner with leading brands from various industries to create dynamic platforms and intelligent digital experiences that drive innovation and transform businesses.
   

  

 From prototype to real-world impact - be part of a global shift by doing work that matters.
   

  

**Job Description**
 We are seeking a talented C++ DevOps Engineer to join our dynamic team in Stockholm, Sweden. In this role, you will bridge the gap between software development and operations, leveraging your expertise in C++ programming and DevOps practices to streamline our development processes and enhance our product delivery pipeline.
   

  

* Develop, maintain, and optimize C++ codebases for high-performance applications
* Design and implement robust CI/CD pipelines to automate build, test, and deployment processes
* Collaborate with development teams to improve code quality, system reliability, and scalability
* Manage and optimize containerized environments using Docker and Kubernetes
* Monitor system performance and troubleshoot issues in production environments
* Develop and maintain documentation for DevOps processes and best practices
* Continuously evaluate and integrate new technologies to improve development and operations workflows
* Participate in code reviews and provide constructive feedback to team members
* Contribute to the company's overall DevOps strategy and culture
* Work three days at the customer location or in the office


**Qualifications**
* Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Software Engineering, or a related field
* 3+ years of experience in C++ development, with a strong understanding of modern C++ standards
* 2+ years of hands-on experience with DevOps practices and tools
* Proficiency in version control systems, particularly Git
* Experience with CI/CD tools such as Jenkins, GitLab CI, or CircleCI
* Strong knowledge of Linux/Unix systems and shell scripting
* Familiarity with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP) and their DevOps-related services
* Experience with containerization technologies, especially Docker and Kubernetes
* Knowledge of infrastructure as code principles and tools (e.g., Terraform, Ansible)
* Proficiency in scripting languages such as Python or Bash
* Experience with monitoring and logging tools (e.g., Prometheus, ELK stack)
* Strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail
* Excellent communication and collaboration abilities
* Understanding of agile methodologies and software development lifecycle
* Relevant DevOps certifications (e.g., AWS Certified DevOps Engineer, Docker Certified Associate) are a plus
* Can fluently speak and write in both Swedish & English.


 Additional Information
   

  

 Discover some of the global benefits that empower our people to become the best version of themselves:
   

  

  

* Finance:
   

 Competitive salary package, share plan, company performance bonuses, value-based recognition awards, referral bonus;
* Career Development:
   

 Career coaching, global career opportunities, non-linear career paths, internal development programmes for management and technical leadership;
* Learning Opportunities:
   

 Complex projects, rotations, internal tech communities, training, certifications, coaching, online learning platforms subscriptions, pass-it-on sessions, workshops, conferences;
* Work-Life Balance:
   

 Hybrid work and flexible working hours, employee assistance programme;
* Health:
   

 Global internal wellbeing programme, access to wellbeing apps;
* Community:
   

 Global internal tech communities, hobby clubs and interest groups, inclusion and diversity programmes, events and celebrations.


 At Endava, we’re committed to creating an open, inclusive, and respectful environment where everyone feels safe, valued, and empowered to be their best. We welcome applications from people of all backgrounds, experiences, and perspectives—because we know that inclusive teams help us deliver smarter, more innovative solutions for our customers. Hiring decisions are based on merit, skills, qualifications, and potential. If you need adjustments or support during the recruitment process, please let us know.

title: Freelance Software Developer (Rust) - AI Tutor
description:
At Mindrift, innovation meets opportunity. We believe in using the power of collective intelligence to ethically shape the future of AI.
   

  

**What We Do**
 The Mindrift platform connects specialists with AI projects from major tech innovators. Our mission is to unlock the potential of Generative AI by tapping into real-world expertise from across the globe.
   

  

**About The Role**
 GenAI models are improving very quickly, and one of our goals is to make them capable of addressing specialized questions and achieving complex reasoning skills. If you join the platform as an AI Tutor in Coding, you'll have the opportunity to collaborate on these projects.
   

  

 Although every project is unique, you might typically:
   

  

* Generate prompts that challenge AI
* Define comprehensive scoring criteria to evaluate the accuracy of the AI's answers
* Correct the model's responses based on your domain-specific knowledge


**How To Get Started**
 Simply apply to this post, qualify, and get the chance to contribute to projects aligned with your skills, on your own schedule. From creating training prompts to refining model responses, you'll help shape the future of AI while ensuring technology benefits everyone.
   

  

**Requirements**
* You have a Master's degree in Software Development, Computer Science, or other related fields.
* You have at least 3 years of professional experience with Rust
* Code review experience is a must
* Experience with AI projects is a plus
* Your level of English is advanced (C1) or above
* You are ready to learn new methods, able to switch between tasks and topics quickly and sometimes work with challenging, complex guidelines
* Our freelance role is fully remote so, you just need a laptop, internet connection, time available and enthusiasm to take on a challenge


**Benefits**
**Why this freelance opportunity might be a great fit for you?**
* Take part in a part-time, remote, freelance project that fits around your primary professional or academic commitments
* Work on advanced AI projects and gain valuable experience that enhances your portfolio
* Influence how future AI models understand and communicate in your field of expertise

title: Game Developer (Slots, Pixi.js)
description:
**About us:** 




  





**EveryMatrix** 
 is a leading B2B SaaS provider delivering iGaming software, content and services. We provide casino, sports betting, platform and payments, and affiliate management to
 **200 customers worldwide.** 




 But that's not all! We're not just about numbers,
 **we're about people** 
 . With a team of over 1000 passionate individuals spread across twelve countries in Europe, Asia, and the US, we're all united by our love for innovation and teamwork.
 



 Join us on this exciting journey as we continue to redefine the iGaming landscape, one groundbreaking solution at a time.
 



**We’re looking for a creative and resourceful JavaScript/TypeScript Game Developer to join our team in Stockholm.**

* Make amazing games, from wacky ideas all the way to finished products;
* Game development using JavaScript/Typescript + Pixi.JS;
* Maintenance of existing games;

* Strong experience with JavaScript/TypeScript;
* Pixi JS experience - must-have;

* Strong knowledge of OOP, SOLID principles and Clean Code principles;
* Experience working in gaming;
* Experience in structured software development;
* Good level of written and spoken English.

 Coverage through

 , ensuring financial support in case of unexpected events.

 Access to high-quality healthcare services, tailored to meet your needs.

 Additional financial support for personal health-related expenses.



  





 At EveryMatrix, we're committed to creating a supportive and inclusive workplace where you can thrive both personally and professionally. Come join us and experience the difference!
 



 EveryMatrix is a member of the World Lottery Association (WLA) and European Lotteries Association. In September 2023 it became the first iGaming supplier to receive WLA Safer Gambling Certification. EveryMatrix is proud of its commitment to safer gambling and player protection whilst producing market leading gaming solutions.
