title: Utvecklings- och Förvaltningsledare IFS
description:
Sveriges vackraste arbetsplats söker en


**Utvecklings- och Förvaltningsledare IFS**
-------------------------------------------


med placering i Norrköping

  


2021 påbörjade Sjöfartsverket implementation av ERP-systemet IFS Cloud med det långsiktiga målet att samla alla affärskritiska processer i ett och samma system. 2023 driftsattes den första funktionaliteten inom främst ekonomi och inköp, nu pågår införandet av service- och underhållsmodulen som beräknas driftsättas hösten 2025. Därefter fortsätter utvecklingsresan där fler administrativa stödsystem förväntas konsolideras in mot ERP-lösningen.  

  

Från och med våren 2025 kommer drift, förvaltning, utveckling och support av systemet att ske i Sjöfartsverkets egen regi, och just nu stärker vi upp IFS-organisationen genom rekrytering av nyckelpersoner och med inhyrd expertis från IFS partners. Sjöfartsverket söker nu en erfaren och engagerad objektledare som kan fortsätta driva utvecklingen och förvaltningen av vårt affärssystem, när vår nuvarande objektledare trappar ner inför pension.


**Arbetsuppgifter**  

Som objektledare ansvarar du för utveckling och förvaltning av IFS Cloud på Sjöfartsverket. Till din hjälp har du en organisation om ca 30 personer bestående av objektspecialister, lösningsteam, tekniker, verksamhetsutvecklare mfl. Du tillhör och företräder verksamheten och arbetar kontinuerligt med utbildning, förbättring, vidareutveckling och anpassning av affärssystemet. I tjänsten ingår att i nära samverkan med organisation och leverantörer säkerställa funktion och effektivitet för verksamheten och att de möjligheter som ges av lösningen används på bästa sätt för att optimera affärsprocesserna. Du planerar, prioriterar, koordinerar och följer upp utvecklings- och förvaltningsarbetet och rapporterar framdrift och ekonomiskt utfall till chef och objektets styrgrupp. Vid större utvecklingar kan arbetet bedrivas i projektform, där du blir en viktig del i projektets styrgrupp.


**Vem är du?**  

Vi söker dig som har…


* Akademisk utbildning inom för tjänsten relevant område alternativt flerårig erfarenhet som kan bedömas likvärdig.


* Minst tre års erfarenhet av liknande roll/ansvar i stora och komplexa organisationer.


* Gedigen och bred erfarenhet av projekt- och förändringsledning med gott resultat


* Aktuell och flerårig erfarenhet av att driva utvecklingsprojekt i ERP-system


* Erfarenhet av att leda utan att vara chef och att rapportera till styr- eller ledningsgrupper.


* Erfarenhet av teambaserat och agilt arbetssätt.


* Goda kunskaper i svenska och engelska, i såväl tal som skrift.


Det är meriterande om du har ....


* Erfarenhet inom IT- och informationssäkerhetsområdet.


* Erfarenhet av utveckling och förvaltning inom IFS.


* Erfarenhet av att leda strategiska utvecklingsprojekt


Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper. Vi söker dig som är prestigelös och kan driva, planera och leda arbeten framåt med både verksamhets- och leveransfokus. Du kan arbeta självständigt och tillsammans med andra, därför är samarbetsvilja och god kommunikation viktiga egenskaper. Du har en förmåga att snabbt sätta dig in i olika verksamheter och skapa dig en förståelse för aktuellt läge. I ditt ledarskap har du ett coachande förhållningssätt och delar med dig av dina kunskaper. Du hanterar dina åtaganden strukturerat med ett agilt och flexibelt mindset.


Tjänsten kan komma att kräva svenskt medborgskap. Säkerhetsprövning med registerkontroll kan komma att genomföras innan erbjudande om anställning.


**Varför ska du välja Sjöfartsverket?**  

Sjöfartsverket är ett tjänsteproducerande affärsverk inom transportsektorn. Vår arbetsmiljö är unik och vårt uppdrag är unikt – Sveriges vackraste arbetsplats. Vårt uppdrag är att utveckla transport och sjöfart i linje med riksdagens och regeringens beslut. Vår affärsidé är att erbjuda effektiva sjövägar, moderna tjänster och maritimt partnerskap för tillväxt, konkurrenskraft och hållbar utveckling.


Sjöfartsverket erbjuder en trivsam arbetsmiljö med goda möjligheter att förena arbetsliv och privatliv, det kan till exempel finnas möjlighet till enskild överenskommelse om distansarbete några dagar i veckan. Vi har en tydlig identitet och ett starkt varumärke. Vi är en utvecklingsinriktad organisation och arbetar ständigt för att utveckla våra medarbetare samt för att upprätthålla våra nöjda kunder. Är vi rätt organisation för dig är det en självklarhet för dig att agera på ett professionellt, öppet och engagerat sätt. Vårt arbete utgår från den statliga värdegrunden, vi arbetar också aktivt för jämställdhet, mångfald och inkludering och ser det som en självklarhet att du delar vår uppfattning.


**Hur och när?**  

Den här rekryteringen gäller en tillsvidareanställning som beräknas tillsättas snarast.


Sjöfartsverket kan komma att tillämpa sex månaders provanställning.  

Befattningen kan innebära krigsplacering vid Sjöfartsverket.


Intervjuer kommer att hållas under vecka 24-25.


**Upplysningar:**  

Chef Kajsa Bellinger, 010-478 46 71 eller kajsa.bellinger@sjofartsverket.se


**Fackliga företrädare:**  

Saco-S Peter Hellberg, OFR/ST Carl Cremonese, Seko Ib Bergström, samtliga kan nås via vår växel 0771-630000.


**Ansökan:**  

Registrera din ansökan senast 8 juni 2025.  

Diarienummer: 25-00630


*Sjöfartsverket gör kontinuerliga och aktiva val kring exponering och rekryteringsstöd i varje rekrytering. Vi undanber oss därför direktkontakt av annonsförsäljare, bemannings- och rekryteringsföretag.*

title: Fullstack Engineer - Payments
description:
**ABOUT THE ROLE**  

We are looking for a Fullstack Engineer for our Payments domain. In this domain, we work with all payment transactions to and from the player’s gaming account. Whether it’s card or bank-based, new regulatory requirements, it’s all handled by Payments!  

You will work with a team of developers focusing on developing innovative and high-performing features with cloud technologies in very high-throughput transactional systems.  

You will work within the full chain of development having end-to-end responsibilities from requirements collection to deployment and maintenance of the team's services. The team has great freedom to agree on what to build and follows up with user testing, monitoring not only the service's technical performance but also from a monetary perspective. **YOU WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR:*** Taking part in designing, developing and maintaining services in the payments domain in general and especially to our internal tools and systems, like the Payments Backoffice.
* Testing and updating documentation.
* Participating in architectural discussions and suggesting ideas for technical improvements.
* Teaming up with other developers, architects and stakeholders to ensure that our platform meets the needs of our players.

  

**OUR SUCCESSFUL CANDIDATE WILL HAVE THE FOLLOWING**


ESSENTIAL SKILLS* Min. 4 years of experience in using Java + Spring Boot framework
* Experience with TypeScript, React,
* Experience with MySQL and Kafka
* Familiarity with microservice architecture
* Being not only a developer but primarily a software engineer - you love taking ownership of the solutions from their design to implementation and maintenance.
* Excellent written and verbal communication skills, capable of articulating technical decisions and offering valuable recommendations to the team
* Fluent English (C1 level is a minimum, as we communicate in English)

  

NICE TO HAVES

* Experience with Material UI
* Experience with Kotlin
* Experience building applications for payments industry
* Experience with Google Cloud Platform

 **WHO WE ARE**  

At the core of LeoVegas Group is Team Leo. Our culture is our foundation and is what enables us to innovate, build, and lead as we trailblaze our way through the igaming industry. We’re a team of over 1800 innovators, initiators, and groundbreakers working in a fast-paced and agile environment across 16 offices worldwide. **BENEFITS*** Hybrid work policy, currently 3 days in the office
* 4 weeks of Workation (Terms & Conditions apply)
* 30 annual vacation days
* Occupational Pension
* 5,000 SEK wellness contribution annually
* Parental Leave Top-Up
* Possibility to enrol in a private health care insurance for both you and your partner
* 1,500 SEK equipment allowance
* Benify - benefits portal with many offers and discounts

 **JOIN US!**  

In our pride, we like to empower our teammates to find their roar and run with their wildest ideas. We don’t wait around for things to happen, we pounce and make it happen!  

Would you be a good fit for the Leo Pride - give us a roar!  

  

\*\*As our company working language is English we’d like to see your CV in English please\*\*

title: Associate Support Specialist
description:
**Associate Support Specialist**

**LOCATION: STOCKHOLM, SWEDEN**

**FULL-TIME, PERMANENT**

**HYBRID – 3 DAYS IN THE OFFICE**

Notified is growing and we are hiring an Associate Support Specialist for the Client Service Delivery team in Stockholm.


The Associate Support Specialist is responsible for database administration, account creation, and customer service within the Public Relations line of business. Your role will be to ensure customer service delivery in an accurate and timely manner while upholding security protocols.


You will serve as a subject matter expert for Notified Public Relations Cloud products, providing day-to-day client advice and support. You will also promote the organization’s capabilities to clients and identify sales opportunities to be forwarded to the account managers in the Sales Department resulting in contract extensions or additional business within the account(s).


**Your task would include:**

* providing day-to-day client advice, working to maintain strong client relationships
* communicating clearly with clients via phone, email, and chat
* responding to basic client support inquiries, ensuring they are handled in order of priority
* participating in analysis and resolution of unresolved support issues, escalating more complex issues to senior colleagues
* assisting in solving problems for clients, ensuring that SLAs and KPIs are met
* performing administrative duties including account and user maintenance outcomes using good interpersonal skills and organizational skills
* collaborating with teammates to work occasional overtime during high volume periods of other Notified service offerings

**What will you bring?**

* Excellent Swedish & English speaking and writing skills
* Minimum of 1 year of experience in a client-facing position
* Previous newswire experience is preferred
* Customer service experience in a fast-paced environment
* Experience in support of complex products will be considered an advantage.
* Excellent multi-tasking skills
* Exceptional time-management skills, ability to prioritize assignments and meet deadlines
* Projects self-confidence, enthusiasm, and a positive, can-do attitude
Tech savvy mindset and ability to learn new programs/software quickly  
* 

**Why Notified…**

We place a lot of value in giving our clients the solutions and support they need to operate efficiently and successfully. This same desire we use to set our customers up for success applies to our employees as well. Notified committed to helping our employees and their families maintain a healthy work/life balance, to build a financially secure future. Self-development and learning are key with all our global employees having access to our internal learning and development university DevelopU for career and skills enhancement.


**What Do We Offer:**

* A diverse international work environment - global collaboration with team members in 17 countries!
* Comprehensive health benefits and wellness programs.
* Flexible work arrangements. This role will be based out of our Stockholm office, located at Vasagatan 28. Our expectation at this time is that you would work from the office on Tuesday, Wednesday, and Thursday with flexibility to work from home on Monday and Friday.
* Regular learning sessions, team-building events, and activities.
* Annual social events, including Summer and Christmas parties.
* A culture that celebrates innovation and creativity.
* Access to our virtual university, offering over 8,000 online courses.
* Quarterly Recognition Awards.
A rewarding Referral Bonus Scheme.  
* 

**About NOTIFIED!**

We believe everyone has a story to tell and we’re passionate about helping people and brands amplify their stories across the globe. We are proud to be the number one provider of enterprise webcasting and investor relations content distribution, as well as a global leader in press release distribution. Our clients have used Notified to monitor over 2 billion social media conversations every year! Our products are built so storytellers can do their best work. But we’re not just a platform—personalized, caring service is how we operate. We add a personal touch to everything we do. We strive to deliver wisdom and insight by helping our clients reach global and targeted audiences, measure outcomes, and fulfill their commitments.


**Join the Best In Class!** 

“Best Press Release Distribution Company,” MarTech Breakthrough Awards
 

“PR Innovation of the Year,” Gold Stevie® Winner, 2023 American Business Awards
 

“Marketing/Public Relations Solution,” Gold Stevie® Winner, 2023 American Business Awards


**What’s Next…**

Qualified candidates will be contacted by a member of our in-house recruitment team to kick-start the recruitment process. If you are a possible fit, you will be invited to meet with a few key individuals in order to help you get a full understanding of the team and the position. Our goal is for you to get to know us as we get to know you!


**Apply now to join our successful team!**

**Please Note**

Subject to local legislation, and as applicable to the position to which you have applied, Notified may require your consent at the point of offer to complete certain background screening checks including (but not limited to) Legal right to work in the relevant country, reference checks, Credit checks and Criminal checks. Failure to complete these checks / meet the required criteria may result in offer withdrawal.

title: Skapa, forma, påverka – bli vår nästa visuella stjärna!
description:
**Vill du vara med och lyfta vår visuella kommunikation till nästa nivå?**  

Vi söker dig som brinner för grafisk formgivning och vill använda din kreativitet för att stärka vårt varumärke. Nu har du chansen att vara en nyckelperson i att bygga upp vår interna kapacitet inom grafisk produktion!

**Om rollen**


I rollen som **marknadskommunikatör med grafisk inriktning** får du en central plats i vårt marknadsteam. Du kommer främst att arbeta med grafisk formgivning och produktion – från idé till färdig layout i både digitala och tryckta kanaler. Du är också med och utvecklar vårt visuella uttryck och säkerställer att vi håller en röd tråd i allt vi gör.

**Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:**


Du kommer att arbeta med att ta fram grafiskt material för kampanjer, nyhetsbrev, webb, sociala medier och olika typer av evenemang såsom mässor. I rollen ingår också att skapa mallar och riktlinjer för att säkerställa ett enhetligt grafiskt uttryck. Vid behov producerar du nya illustrationer och anpassar befintliga grafiska element. Du samarbetar även med våra tryckerier och andra externa leverantörer för att säkerställa hög kvalitet i det material vi tar fram.  

  

**Vi söker dig som har:**

* Eftergymnasial utbildning inom grafisk design, visuell kommunikation eller liknande.
* Mycket goda kunskaper i Adobe Creative Cloud (framför allt InDesign, Illustrator och Photoshop).
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med grafisk produktion i olika kanaler.
* ️ Ett öga för detaljer, färg, form och typografi.
* Förmåga att arbeta självständigt, strukturerat och prestigelöst.
* ️ God kommunikativ förmåga på svenska.


Erfarenhet från arbete i en större organisation är meriterande, liksom förståelse för tillgänglighetsanpassad kommunikation (WCAG).

**Mer information**


Välkommen med din ansökan **1 Juni.** Urval görs löpande så dröj inte med att söka!


Kontakta gärna Enhetschef Henrik Severed via Henrik.Severed@jonkopingenergi.se alt 036-103247 för mer information.


För fackliga frågor Jesper Käki, Vision, på tel. 036-19 18 45 eller Majd Kamal, Sveriges Ingenjörer, på tel. 036-10 32 37.


Då vi arbetar med samhällsviktig verksamhet är anställningen säkerhetsklassad. Säkerhetsprövning kommer att genomföras före anställning. Med anställning följer en skyldighet att krigsplaceras.


*Inför varje rekrytering tar vi beslut om vilka rekryteringskanaler vi ska använda och därför undanber vi oss ytterligare erbjudanden om kompetensförmedling, annonserings- och rekryteringshjälp*

title: Application Consultant - nyce.logic
description:
**Imagine something you can do today that you couldn’t do in the past – like paying for groceries without opening your wallet. Extenda Retail is a Market -leading company with extensive retail and logistics knowledge. Our innovations touch everyday lives. Join a company that simplifies shopping and inspires retailers and logistics businesses to go further.**  

  

We can now present an opportunity where you get the chance to fuel growth and reduce complexity with our competitive warehouse management system called NYCE.LOGIC. It is a cloud-based, competitive warehouse management system that is designed and developed to reduce complexity and costs while also enabling scalability for both B2C and B2B companies. Our WMS allows 3PLs, retailers and logistics providers to make their warehouse a competitive advantage. Together, we change and improve the way retail works.

*We are now looking for an Application Consultant to strengthen our team and enable further success as we are on a journey to go after new business on a global scale.*  

  

**As Application Consultant** at Extenda Retail you will work close to the client's environment and function as an expert by guiding them on the capacity of our product. In the role as Application Consultant you will get the opportunity to work with well-known clients within logistics, retail and e-commerce. As you will work in close collaboration with the client you will function as an enabler of success by analyzing their needs and translating them into functional requirements for the solution. With a solid understanding of workflows, processes and the market you will be in the heart of the business as you contribute to our continuous growth.  

  



**Your mission is to** contribute to our clients development by delivering a high level of service and a great understanding of their business needs. In the role as Application Consultant you will have a great impact on the daily operations in the client environment by developing their logistics flows. You will work in cross-functional teams and collaborate with different stakeholders internally to ensure customer satisfaction through our innovative solutions. We offer you a role in the interface of tech and business where you will get the opportunity to grow professionally as you join us on our exciting journey.  

  

We want you, an ambitious and driven person with a solid understanding of the logistics and supply chain industry to join our team as our next application consultant. We think that you want to contribute in sharing ideas to make an impact on how we work. You also have a sound technological understanding together with a strong drive to benefit from personal development. You are a team player that takes responsibility and has a solution oriented approach.

*Does it sound interesting? Then we would love for you to join us!*


**We offer you**


We believe that your success is our success. That’s why we care for you, love that you are innovative and trust that you will succeed. Here are some of the perks we offer you:

* We want you to feel safe and focus on what makes you thrive, that’s why we offer you strategic training in leadership, flexibility, solid insurance, and health initiatives.
* We want you to find room for your innovative ideas and will support you to reach your potential. For that, you will have a plan and support for your development.
* We want you to trust yourself, feel excited to lead yourself and deliver with quality. That’s why we promote a balance between work and life, and a feedback culture where you dare to question and push for your ideas.

  

**We believe you...**

* Have a degree in Computer science, IT, Logistics or equivalent work experience.
* Are fluent in English, both verbal and writing.
* Are fluent in Swedish, both verbal and writing.
* Have a solid understanding or interest in WMS and/or ERP-system.
* Have knowledge of Java, C# or Typescript.
* 

**Location**


Gothenburg

title: German-speaking Customer Support Representative to Web...
description:
At **Web Manuals**, we’re transforming the aviation industry with innovative SaaS solutions that help our customers work smarter, safer, and more efficiently. Our journey is driven by continuous growth and a spirit of exploration - while our product lives in the cloud, our ambitions reach far beyond! As a proudly bootstrapped company, we’re charting our own course and building something truly exceptional.


With offices in Malmö (HQ), San Diego, New York, Sydney, and Singapore, we offer an international environment where you can grow both professionally and personally. Now, we’re looking for a **German-speaking Customer Support Representative** to join our team in Malmö!

 **About the role**

  

As a Customer Support Representative, you’ll be part of our dedicated Support & Academy Team, committed to providing outstanding service and helping customers get the most out of our product. You’ll become a product expert and a trusted partner for our customers, solving challenges and ensuring their success.

 **Your responsibilities will include:**

* Delivering exceptional customer service via phone and email, in German and English
* Resolving customer inquiries, technical issues, and troubleshooting effectively
* Collaborating with product and engineering teams to address feedback and improve our solutions
* Creating and maintaining clear, helpful documentation and knowledge base articles
* Delivering virtual and onsite training in our product, supporting the Academy team when needed

 **About you**  

We believe you’ll thrive in this role if you have:

* Fluency in German and English, both written and spoken
* Previous experience in a customer-facing role
* Strong communication and problem-solving skills
* Patience, empathy, and a commitment to helping others


It’s a plus if you also bring:

* Experience in SaaS or the aviation industry
* Basic knowledge of HTML, CSS, or JavaScript
* A post-secondary education with a technical focus
  
* 

  

**What we’re looking for**  

We’re seeking someone who is:

* Customer-focused and solution-oriented
* A collaborative team player
* Communicative and proactive
* Motivated with a strong sense of ownership

**Other information**

  

* Start date: August (flexible)
* Work extent: Full-time
* Location: Malmö
* Our recruitment process includes assessment tests to ensure a fair, objective, and inclusive hiring experience.

  

Want to learn more about life at Web Manuals? Visit our Instagram or check out our About Us page.

title: Cloudutvecklare till medarbetarägt konsultbolag!
description:
*På TechSeed är vi övertygade om att det är tekniken som kommer göra världen till en bättre plats. Vi ser ett stort behov i vårt samhälle att kombinera affärsförståelse, digitalt ledarskap samt innovativa arbetssätt och lösningar med framtidens tekniker i uppkopplade ekosystem. Vi tror på en hållbar framtid med säkra lösningar genom exempelvis IoT-lösningar, digitala tvillingar, AI och cybersäkerhet. Det här är vårt WHY och det fyller oss med energi varje dag. Det här är vår arena.*


TechSeed är ett medarbetarägt bolag som erbjuder konsulttjänster och har ett kompetensdjup inom flera domäner. Vi är på en kraftig tillväxtresa och söker nu **utvecklare** som även kommer få en stor grad av inflytande och insyn i hur vi växer framåt och tar ett helhetsgrepp om uppkopplade ekosystem och lösningar. Vi söker dig som trivs i konsultrollen och samtidigt vill bidra till att skapa vägen framåt för TechSeed – Tillsammans.


I denna roll kommer du vara del av ett team som fokuserar på Integration och Cloud, där vi är i en spännande uppstartsfas. I rollen som utvecklare kommer du arbeta som konsult i samarbete med våra kunder. Vi kommer samarbeta för att hitta lämpliga uppdrag och anpassa både uppdrag och roll utifrån dina intressen och din bakgrund. Ditt team tillhör enheten **TechSeed Hyperautomation** som specialiserar sig inom arkitektur, integration, automation och projektledning. Enhetens vision och uppdrag är att sammanlänka olika delar av organisationer och tekniker för att minska manuella metoder som kräver mycket tid och resurser. Deras tjänster inkluderar RPA, BPA, traditionella integrationer och APIer, AI, ML, Computer vision och low code-lösningar.


Enheten präglas av en stark förmåga att bygga strukturer och se sammanhang och en stark sammanhållning. Som delägare och anställd kommer du vara med i utvecklingen av våra erbjudanden, få möjlighet att påverka de områden som du drivs av och samtidigt få tryggheten av ett team med gemensamt mål och gemensamma intressen.

  


**Vem söker vi?**


Vi söker dig vars expertis är utveckling! Vi söker dig som är nyfiken på ny teknik, trivs i roller där du utvecklas och trivs i en kultur där vi hjälps åt och bygger bolaget **tillsammans**. För att trivas behöver du vara bekväm i rollen som utvecklare och ha minst 5 års relevant arbetslivserfarenhet. Vi söker dig som har:

* God förståelse för cloudtekniker, cloudarkitektur och utveckling av mikrotjänster i antingen AWS eller Azure
* Goda kunskaper inom containers (Docker, Kubernetes)
* Din styrka i Java eller C#
* Erfarenhet av CI/CD pipelines, IaC (Terraform, CloudFormation)
* Erfarenhet av API och integration
* Trivs i en miljö som präglas av samarbete och gemensamma mål


Eftersom vi arbetar med flera typer av kunder med olika behov krävs det för rollen att vara obehindrad i både svenska och engelska, tal och skrift. Det är även meriterande om du har erfarenhet inom automotive, erfarenhet som konsult eller av ScaleUp-miljöer.

 **Om TechSeed**


Vi är ett medarbetarägt konsultbolag i ScaleUp-fasen med visionen att skapa värde med uppkopplade lösningar. Vi tror på kombinationen av nära samarbeten, framtidens tekniker och att gemensamt arbeta för att skapa ett bolag vi verkligen trivs på. Genom att erbjuda **delägarskap** till våra anställda ger vi möjligheten till insyn och påverkan, samtidigt som det gynnar samarbeten och att prioritera vad som är bäst för gruppen. Detta speglas både i vår **kultur** och våra erbjudanden, där vi kombinerar vårt stora **tekniska intresse** med ett kundanpassat förhållningssätt samtidigt som vi har många sociala aktiviteter och en härlig gemenskap på kontoren. Vår arena är uppkopplade ekosystem, där tekniker som IoT och Intelligent Edge används för att skapa uppkopplade tjänster och system inom ekosystem som **Smart Cities, Smart Factories, Smart Companies** och **Smart Buildings**.


Vår grund ligger i att vi delar med oss av vår passion för teknik och värdet vi skapar. Det handlar bland annat om kunskapsutbyte och att dela idéer, bidra med god stämning såväl som att skapa värde genom vårt delägarskap. Vi erbjuder dig:

* Inflytande i hur vi bygger TechSeed tillsammans
* En öppen kultur där vi värdesätter olikheter, insikter och innovationer
* Direkt värde från våra finansiella resultat genom bonus och delägarskap
* Möjligheten att växa in i olika tekniska områden / ansvarsområden utifrån dina önskemål
* Flexibelt arbete hemifrån, beroende på uppdragets behov.
* Bra pensioner, försäkringar och 5000kr i friskvård

title: evroc Summer Internship
description:
Have you heard about the company building the European cloud—competing with industry giants to reclaim ownership of European data? That’s us. Founded to power a digital Europe, evroc is creating a secure, sovereign, and sustainable hyperscale cloud to end foreign dominance in the European cloud market. And this summer, we’re looking for interns to join our mission.


We’re looking for curious and passionate engineering students who want to dive into the world of coding and machine learning. This summer, you’ll be part of our journey — working across different teams, exploring real projects, and gaining hands-on experience in a dynamic environment. You’ll get the chance to grow your skills, connect with inspiring colleagues, and help shape evroc’s journey.


**What’s in it for you?**

* **Hands-on projects** – Work on AI-driven solutions, optimize cloud-based models, and explore cutting-edge tech.
* **Top-tier mentorship** – Learn from experienced developers at the forefront of AI and cloud innovation.
* **Exclusive perks** –evroc merch and trips to visit the offices in London and Sophia Antipolis.
* 

**Who are we looking for?**

* Engineering students (ex. computer science, machine learning, artificial intelligence, engineering physics, information and communication technology, electrical engineering, robotics, software engineering, or data science and big data)
* At least one semester remaining in your studies after the summer.
* Passionate about AI, GPU´s and sustainable energy solutions
* Fluent in spoken and written English
* 

**Practical Details**

* **Duration:** 8 weeks, June 16– Aug 8 2025
* **Location:** Based in Stockholm (Slussen), with visits to our offices in London (Mayfair) and the French Riviera (Sophia Antipolis).

**Work Permit:** Applicants must possess a valid work permit.



At evroc, diversity is our strength. We champion an inclusive environment where every background—ethnicity, age, gender identity, beliefs, and culture—is celebrated.


Spots are limited, so don’t wait! Apply today and be part of something big.

title: Housekeeping Supervisor
description:
**OM ROLLEN**


Tycker du om att arbeta i en spännande, dynamisk internationell miljö är detta jobb för dig!


Tjänsten som Supervisor på vår Housekeepingavdelning innebär att du bland annat är arbetsledare för ditt skift och har därmed full kontroll på vad som händer under ditt arbetspass – såväl mot gäster som mot personal. Att ha en beslutsfattande person på varje arbetspass är ett måste och där är du en oerhört viktig del i detta.


Vidare ingår följande arbetsuppgifter:


* Rumskontroll och säkerställande av kvalité enligt LQA standards
* Arbetsfördelning inom avdelningen
* Planering och uppföljning av storstädning
* Städning av hotellrum samt allmänna ytor vid behov
* Säkerställande av smidig intern kommunikation
* Introduktion och upplärning av nyanställda

Housekeepingavdelningen arbetar för att säkerställa att effektivitet förenas med kvalitet och söker efter dig som kan arbeta både effektivt och har ett öga för detaljer. Det kommer stundtals att krävas en hel del arbete, så att vara stresstålig, lösningsorienterad samt ha förmågan att utföra fysiskt ansträngande uppgifter är därför ett måste. För rätt person kommer det att vara både utvecklande, givande och framför allt väldigt roligt.


Arbetstiderna är förlagda till veckans alla dagar mellan 06:30 och 22:30.

 **VEM ÄR DU?**


Vi söker dig som är:

* Positiv, strukturerad och passionerad med ett öga för detaljer
* Har minst två års yrkesvana - gärna med internationell erfarenhet.
* Du har tidigare erfarenhet och/eller utbildning inom hotell.
* Tidigare erfarenhet av att arbeta med hotellsystemet Opera Cloud
* Alla som arbetar hos oss måste ha fyllt 18 år samt tala god svenska och engelska. Fler språk i denna internationella miljö är naturligtvis ett plus. Vi lägger stor vikt vid dina personliga egenskaper.

**VI ERBJUDER**

* En spännande utmaning och stimulerande arbete i ett Sveriges mest ikoniska hotell med över 300 anställda
* En internationell arbetsplats med en levande kultur och stor mångfald bland både kollegor och gäster
* Arbetsplatsen är placerad på hotellet där vi har högt i tak och en stor variation i arbetsuppgifter
* Att vara med och fortsätta utveckla hotellet för att vara en attraktiv arbetsplats
* Tillsvidareanställning om 100 %
* Lön enligt avtal och tillträde omgående.
* Övriga förmåner inom Grand Group
* Vi utför bakgrundskrontroll som en del av vår rekryteringsprocess.


Intervjuer kommer att ske löpande.

title: Data Analyst
description:
The world of flight simulation is soaring, and so are we! Navigraph is on the hunt for a sharp **Data Analyst** to join our fun and dynamic team.

### **About Navigraph**


Navigraph is a world-leading SaaS company serving serious flight simulator pilots with charts, navigation data, and flight planning services. Our software, built on the latest technology, offers a unique user experience in flight simulation. Navigraph has a strong brand, dedicated users, established products, a great product/market fit, and a clear product roadmap. We are in an excellent position to grow and will provide you with all the means necessary to excel in your work.


Our HQ is in central Stockholm and we have a global crew of c. 45 aviation-loving professionals and growing. Our founders Magnus Axholt (CEO) and Stephen O’Connell (CTO) are still active in the company and our team thrives on creativity, experimentation, and collaboration.


Check out our career site for more information on who we are .


### **What you’ll do as a Data Analyst**


We’re now looking for a **Data Analyst** to join our Data Team and help us uncover actionable user behavior insights on our website and apps to guide our growth and innovation. If you’re skilled in SQL, a data viz wizard who can engage a team with your data stories and have broad experience of the whole data pipeline process, you’re exactly who we’re looking for.


We are in the early stages of setting up our new data analytics team. While you will get excellent technical support from our infrastructure and database experts, it is crucial that you have a pragmatic mindset and are willing to take on a generalist role while we are establishing our new platform.

**You will:**

* **Engage the Team:** Present findings in a way that’s as clear as it is compelling, helping everyone in marketing and product development to make data-driven decisions.
* **Define Data Models:** Set up the new data models in Snowflake to enable self-serve usage of the data.
* **Visualize the Data:** Create stunning, interactive dashboards in Tableau that make insights easy to digest.

**But also:**

* **Survey Deep-Dive:** Analyze responses from our massive yearly user survey (25,000 respondents!) to shape future product development. A treasure trove for understanding our users!
* **Collaborate on ETL:** Assist our infrastructure experts in making the final adjustments of our new AWS/Snowflake data pipeline.
* **Geographical Data Exploration:** Get hands-on with user-generated flight tracking data, identifying trends in flight phases and behaviors. Think Gamification for pilots!

### **Who You Are**

* **Strong interest in business and product**: You’re motivated by the “why”, not just the “how”. Bonus points if you’ve worked with subscription-based business models and understand key metrics like conversion, retention, customer lifetime value (CLV), and churn..
* **Tech proficiency**: You’re comfortable working with tools like SQL, Python, and Git, and have hands-on experience across the data pipeline.
* **Pragmatic thinker:** You know when to build for scalability and when it’s better to keep things simple and lean..
* **Approachable & team-oriented:** You’re not afraid to ask questions, share ideas, and iterate in the open. You value teamwork and open communication.
* **Data-driven problem solver and story-teller:** You know how to take complex data and turn it into insights that the teams can understand and act on.

**Bonus Skills:**

* Experience with modern data tools like dbt and cloud data warehouses (e.g. BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift)
* Prior experience working embedded within product teams
* Interest or experience in developing data infrastructure and architecture

### **What We Offer**

* **Work-Life Balance:** Flexible hours and the freedom to work remotely part-time.
* **Perks:** A great benefits package; please check out our career site.
* **Memorable experiences:** The Navigraph team is a tight-knit group with diverse backgrounds and experiences. We enjoy spending time together, and it is not uncommon for our yearly trips to flight simulator conventions in Europe and the U.S. to be combined with team-building activities that leave lasting impressions!
* **Growth Opportunities:** We’ll support your professional development and will give you the resources to excel.

### **How to Join the Team**


Are you a data analyst who loves uncovering insights, shaping strategy, and maybe even geeking out over flight simulation? Apply now as we will be reviewing applications on an on-going basis.

title: AI Lead Nordics (Insights & data)
description:
**At Capgemini, you’ll have the opportunity to shape your career in a way that suits you, supported by a community of experts who inspire and empower you. We believe in reimagining what’s possible - using technology to build a more sustainable, inclusive world. Our Insights & Data team is at the forefront of this mission, delivering end-to-end Data & AI solutions. Gain exposure to various domains and technologies as Capgemini operates across diverse industries. With over 800 specialists in the Nordics, we leverage strategic partnerships with Google, AWS, Microsoft, Databricks, and Snowflake to scale Data & Analytics in the Cloud. Here, your expertise and perspective matter - join us in driving innovation and transforming industries with cutting-edge data solutions!**  

  

**Your role**  

**We are seeking a dynamic and experienced AI Leader to join our Capgemini Insights & Data team in the Nordics. The AI Leader will play a crucial role in driving pre-sales activities, developing go-to-market strategies, and supporting sales teams with AI-driven solutions. This role requires a deep understanding of AI technologies, strong sales acumen, and the ability to collaborate with cross-functional teams to achieve business objectives.**  

  

**Key Responsibilities:**

* **Be the front runner for AI in Insights & Data cross Nordics. You enjoy the spotlight, speaking and show visibility at events and marketing activities will be part of the role.**
* **Lead pre-sales activities by identifying client needs, presenting AI solutions, and demonstrating the value of our offerings to potential clients.**
* **Develop and execute go-to-market strategies for AI products and services, ensuring alignment with overall business goals and objectives. Utilize the global portfolio in Nordics.**
* **Collaborate with sales teams to create compelling proposals, presentations, and demonstrations that showcase the capabilities and benefits of our AI solutions.**
* **Engage with clients to understand their business challenges and provide tailored AI solutions that address their specific needs.**
* **Stay up to date with the latest advancements in AI and machine learning technologies and incorporate them into sales and marketing efforts.**
* **Build and maintain strong relationships with key clients, partners, and industry stakeholders to drive business growth and expand market presence.**
* **Monitor and evaluate the business performance of our AI deliveries, ensuring they deliver the expected value and making necessary adjustments to improve outcomes.**
* **The role requires frequent travels across the Nordics.**
**Your profile**

* **You are a seasoned data and AI leader who has both expertise and experience in building and scaling data and AI solutions or professional service businesses within the European market.**
* **You have Executive presence. Proficient in earning trust and engaging with executive clients in both the business and technical domain with ease. Able to convey vision at a high level, and dive deep into the intricacies with ease.**
* **Ability to navigate complexity. A savvy business operator, who networks rapidly, is comfortable dealing with ambiguity and complex organisations, is generous with their expertise, and coalesces disparate teams to unite toward a common vision.**
* **Establishes “think big” strategies to achieve AI at scale and develops broad enterprise-wide transformation deals that navigate clients from vision to transformational scale with a focus on business outcomes.**
* **Proven experience in leading AI projects and teams, with a strong track record of delivering successful AI solutions in a pre-sales or sales support role.**
* **Expertise in machine learning, deep learning, natural language processing, and other**
* **Strong sales acumen and experience in developing and executing go-to-market strategies for AI products and services.**
* **Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to work effectively with diverse teams and stakeholders.**
* **Experience in the Nordics market and understanding of local business practices and regulations is a plus.**

  

**What we believe you will enjoy about working here**

* **Be part of a dynamic and innovative team that is at the forefront of AI and data & analytics.**
* **We are the Nordic leader in Data, Analytics & AI**
* **You will work on challenging and impactful projects that drive real business value.**
* **Opportunity for professional growth and development in a supportive and collaborative environment with Global outreach.**

  

**Your Application**  

**If you are passionate about AI and data analytics and are ready to take on a leadership role in a fast-paced and dynamic environment, we would love to hear from you. Apply now to join our team and help us shape the future of AI in the Nordics!**  

***As part of our recruitment process, identity verification and background checks may occasionally be conducted.*** 

**About Capgemini**  

**Capgemini is a global business and technology transformation partner, helping organizations to accelerate their dual transition to a digital and sustainable world, while creating tangible impact for enterprises and society. It is a responsible and diverse group of 340,000 team members in more than 50 countries. With its strong over 55-year heritage, Capgemini is trusted by its clients to unlock the value of technology to address the entire breadth of their business needs. It delivers end-to-end services and solutions leveraging strengths from strategy and design to engineering, all fueled by its market leading capabilities in AI, generative AI, cloud and data, combined with its deep industry expertise and partner ecosystem. The Group reported 2024 global revenues of €22.1 billion.**  

  

**Get The Future You Want** **| www.capgemini.com**

title: Business Application Specialist – Nyckelroll i ITAB:s globala ERP-team
description:
ITAB Group Support AB är en del av ITAB Group – en ledande aktör inom design, utveckling och installation av kompletta butikskoncept för detaljhandeln. Med vår expertis, långsiktiga relationer och innovativa lösningar är ITAB i framkant som partner inom retail. Vi erbjuder karriärmöjligheter i en internationell miljö och strävar efter mångfald samt goda arbetsvillkor. ITAB tar avstamp i våra ledord "ACT" – Ahead, Customer, Together och vi arbetar tillsammans för en hållbar framtid – för affären, människorna och miljön. Läs mer på [itab.com] (https://itab.com) .**Om rollen**



Som **Business Application Specialist** inom Group IT spelar du en central roll i utveckling, implementering och support av ITAB:s globala ERP-system, **IFS Cloud**.



Tjänsten har **fokus på inköp**, med starka kopplingar till **logistik, produktion och försäljning**. Du fungerar som länken mellan verksamhet och IT, med ansvar för att kravställa, analysera, testa och implementera lösningar som bidrar till att nå koncernens affärsmål.



Du har ett affärsmässigt driv och förståelse för hur teknik och ERP-lösningar skapar värde. Rollen är både strategisk och operativ och du samarbetar nära superanvändare, projektledare, leverantörer och kollegor i flera länder.



**Placering:** Jönköping  

**Tjänst:** Heltid, tillsvidare  

**Tillträde:** Enligt överenskommelse  

**Resor:** Upp till 25 % (ca 1 vecka/månad)  

‍ **Rapporterar till:** Business Application Manager


 **Huvudsakliga arbetsuppgifter**


* Vara affärsnära expert vid utveckling av ERP-lösningar med fokus på **inköp**
* Bidra i närliggande processer såsom **logistik, produktion och försäljning**
* Samordna **behovsanalys, kravspecifikation, lösningsdesign och implementation** enligt global template
* Leda **workshops**, utbilda superanvändare och ge 2nd line-support
* Ansvara för dokumentation, dashboards och rapporter
* Felsöka applikationsrelaterade problem, analysera buggar och föreslå förbättringar
* Samarbeta med interna och externa parter (utvecklingsteam, konsulter, IFS-partners) för att säkerställa systemkvalitet
* Stötta i test- och **go-live-faser** i olika länder – där **Italien, Spanien och Frankrike är först ut och går live samtidigt**


**✅** **Krav – erfarenhet och kvalifikationer**


* Gedigen erfarenhet från tillverkande industri, särskilt inom **inköp**
* Förståelse för relaterade områden som **logistik, produktion, ekonomi och försäljning**
* Erfarenhet av att arbeta med affärssystem i liknande roll eller som konsult
* Vana av att arbeta nära verksamheten med **kravställning och processförbättring**
* Dokumenterad **erfarenhet av ERP-system** – gärna IFS Cloud, eller motsvarande (tex. Infor M3, SAP, Dynamics)
* God kommunikationsförmåga på svenska och engelska, i både tal och skrift
* Relevant högskoleutbildning inom t.ex. Supply Chain Management / Logistik, Systemvetenskap / Informatik, Ekonomi med affärssystemsfokus eller annan relevant utbildning och motsvarande arbetslivserfarenhet.
* God erfarenhet och förståelse för **systemintegrationer**, **dashboards**


 **Meriterande / Önskvärt**


* Erfarenhet av att arbeta i **internationella projektmiljöer**
* Tidigare arbete i eller med **IFS Cloud** eller annat molnbaserat ERP-system
* Erfarenhet av **rapportutveckling i Power BI** eller liknande verktyg
* Vana av **Jira** eller liknande system för ärendehantering och testspårning
* Erfarenhet av **rapportdesign**


 **Personliga egenskaper**


* **Affärsförståelse och helhetssyn** – ser hur tekniska lösningar skapar värde
* **Självständig och strukturerad** med förmåga att prioritera och driva på i föränderliga miljöer
* **Kommunikativ och samarbetsinriktad** – bygger relationer och skapar engagemang
* **Analytisk med förmåga att lösa problem och föreslå förbättringar**
* **Nyfiken och lärande** – följer utvecklingen inom ERP och delar gärna ny kunskap


 **Så här söker du**



Känner du igen dig i beskrivningen? Ansök via www.framrekrytering.se.  

Har du frågor om rollen är du varmt välkommen att kontakta **Katarina Czudowska**, telefon 0735-17 37 89.



**Vänta inte – nästa steg i din karriär börjar här!**

title: Tekniker inom Virtualiseringsteknik
description:
**Om jobbet**
-------------


Som en del av virtualiseringsteamet är det du som utvecklar, underhåller och driftar våra virtualiseringsplattformar samt hjälper vår verksamhet med deras behov.


Exempel på arbetsuppgifter:

* Förvalta och utveckla våra virtualiseringsplattformar och dess tjänster.
* Mycket kontakt och ett tätt samarbete med andra team internt och vår verksamhet för att bistå dem i deras frågor/tekniska utmaningar.
* Kreativa och innovativa lösningar för att möta verksamhetens behov.


Du kommer jobba med moderna virtualiseringsmiljöer som VMware och HyperV i en komplex och samhällskritisk IT-miljö. Vi arbetar agilt och nära verksamheten, där du får möjlighet att påverka lösningar och arbeta med ny teknik som t.ex. VMware Cloud Foundation och Aria Suite. Du får också möjlighet att vidareutvecklas - både genom dagligt arbete och kompetenshöjande insatser.


Virtualiseringsteamet arbetar enligt agila metodiker och teamet består idag av 7 personer där vi hjälper varandra och har roligt ihop på jobbet. På Trafikverket erbjuder vi en modern arbetsplats där vi möter varandra med respekt och omsorg i en öppen och nyskapande kultur. Vi tror vi att goda prestationer kommer när du har förutsättningar för en god balans mellan arbete, familj och fritid och du kan därför självklart förlägga en del av din arbetstid på distans.

**Kvalifikationer**
-------------------


Du kommer ha många kontaktytor inom organisationen och vi ser därför att du är uppmärksam och tillmötesgående i ditt bemötande. Du har en god kommunikativ förmåga och förmedlar ditt budskap på ett enkelt sätt anpassat till mottagaren både enskilt och i gruppsammanhang. Vidare har du en god problemlösningsförmåga, förstår samband i en komplex miljö och ser till att leverera kompletta och kvalitetssäkrade lösningar. Självklart ser vi att du är en engagerad person som tar ansvar för dina uppgifter och på ett tydligt och strukturerat sätt planerar, driver och genomför ditt arbete inom deadline.


Vi söker dig som har

* gymnasial utbildning inom IT eller motsvarande kunskaper/utbildning i kombination med arbetslivserfarenhet som av oss bedöms likvärdig
* aktuell erfarenhet genom arbete eller eftergymnasial utbildning av virtualiseringsplattformar Vmware och/eller HyperV, gärna i Enterprisemiljö
* kunskap i scriptning
* goda kunskaper i svenska i tal och skrift.


Det är meriterande om du har

* kunskaper om VMware Cloud Foundation (VCF)
* kunskaper om VMware Aria Suite
* kunskaper om NSX
* arbetslivserfarenhet av agila arbetssätt.
**Övrig information**
---------------------


Beredskap kan ingå i tjänsten.


Placeringsort för tjänsten är Borlänge, Gävle. Önskar du att arbeta delvis på distans? I den här tjänsten finns det möjlighet att arbeta hemifrån upp till 40 procent av din arbetstid. #LI-Hybrid


Anställningen är placerad i säkerhetsklass. För anställning krävs godkänt resultat i säkerhetsprövningen, som genomförs i enlighet med bestämmelser i säkerhetsskyddslagen (2018:585).


Vi använder främst mail (från mejladress: noreply@heroma.se) för att göra utskick och kallelser. Kolla din inkorg och även skräppost/SPAM regelbundet under denna tid för att vara säker på att du får all information från oss!

**Ansökan**
-----------


I denna rekrytering används webbaserade tester som en del i urvalet. Intervjuer sker initialt via Skype och planeras till v. 24 - 25.


De frågor som du får besvara när du skickar in din ansökan kommer att ligga till grund för det första urvalet vi gör. Om det inte står något annat i annonsen vill vi att du bifogar ditt CV. Vi har slutat begära in personligt brev eftersom vi inte har med det som del av urvalsunderlaget.


Inom vår IT-organisation är du med och utvecklar Sverige med hjälp av moderna och innovativa lösningar. Vi är mitt i en spännande förändring där vi försöker ta vara på digitaliseringens möjligheter till fullo. Digitaliseringen ställer allt större krav och vi vill därför anpassa oss vad gäller kompetens, arbetssätt och organisation i takt med utvecklingen. Vi har ett helhetsansvar för IT och telekom, en verksamhet som pågår dygnet runt, året om - precis som Sveriges transportsystem.


På Trafikverket jobbar vi med att göra Sverige närmare. Vi tror på att en förening av olika erfarenheter, bakgrunder och perspektiv är den bästa grunden för att bygga en arbetsplats fri från diskriminering och en miljö där alla trivs och gör sitt bästa. Vi tror på mångfald där den gemensamma nämnaren är pålitlighet, engagemang och mod. För det är så vi bäst representerar vårt samhälle.
company_description: Trafikverket ansvarar för långsiktig planering av transportsystemet för vägtrafik, järnvägstrafik, sjöfart och luftfart.

title: Engineering Manager - Quality Assurance
description:
Job Title
Engineering Manager - Quality Assurance
Job Description*Are you a person with a lot of energy and commitment interested in developing both individuals, groups and business?* *Are you looking for a stable employer with long-term growth? We offer you the opportunity to develop in your role at a world leading company using cutting edge technology.**We are now looking for an Engineering manager within QA for our HQ in Lund. Are you the one we are looking for?*
Who is your future team?  

With our increased focus on cloud connected solutions we have created a new test team called Connected Device Test. The team consists of about 15 happy and forward individuals that value teamwork and each other. With us, you are encouraged to dare to take on new challenges and contribute to us constantly improving. Our test engineers sit together and collaborate closely with developers and with internal and external partners. We want to be at the forefront of new ways of working and strive for a culture where everyone can be themselves, creative and innovative - every day!  

  

Aside from this team you will also be part of the management team for the Connected & Platform Test department. In addition, we work very closely with our corresponding development managers. Together our goal is to help and support each other, so that together we can develop and improve the business and make everyday life easier for our employees.
What you’ll do here as an Engineering manager within QA?  

In this role you will lead a team both operational and strategic. You will support, coach and help your team to develop, and you will constantly work to improve our testing operations, both short- and long-term.
You will collaborate with managers outside of the management team, work closely with your colleagues within your own management team and keep a dialog with both internal and external partners. Together with the product manager, program manager and project managers you will work to continuously collaborate on test strategies, priorities and functional changes.
Who are we looking for?  

We think that you are an open person with a genuine interest in leading other people and teams. You are a natural leader who leads by example and always strives to improve and evolve your leadership. You combine the ability to listen and coach with being able to make decisions and find a good balance between these. You like to have fun at work and think it is an important part for everyone to enjoy and be able to perform in the best way. To you it is important to create a safe environment for your team to grow in.
You are driven and strive to identify, implement and follow up development opportunities and are not afraid to think outside of the box.
We’d love to hear that you have previous experience in both software testing and some kind of leading role.  

  

What Axis have to offer  

By joining Axis, you will embark on an exciting journey of personal and professional growth. We will offer you a great introduction to Axis with training. Our team will support you but also listen to your experiences and give you freedom to explore and realize your ideas. We are a fast-growing company that can offer you great career opportunities and a competitive package of benefits.
In exchange for your dedication, Axis offers you a job in an open, friendly, and professional environment. We work in an innovative and global organization that takes great pride in delivering world-class, high-quality products, services, and solutions to our customers. Working with us gives you an excellent opportunity to develop in an organization promoting professional and individual growth. You will have a role where your operational effort really will be of great impact to the overall success of Axis.
Our corporate culture is essential – where equal opportunities, team spirit and having fun are key! We want you to enjoy working with us and therefore we offer benefits such as flexible working hours, morning fika, Friday cake, bonus program, fitness allowance, health insurance and your very own Axis bike, to name a few.
Ready to Act?  

Does this sound like the next opportunity you’re looking for? We go through applications continuously so don’t wait to send in your application!
If you have any questions, please reach out to recruiting manager Tobias Elmhäll at +46 46 272 1908.
Type of Employment
Permanent Employment
Posting End Date
2025-06-06*Certain roles at Axis require background checks, which means applicable verifications will be done in these recruitments.* *Notice will be provided before we take any action.*
About Axis Communications
We enable a smarter, safer world by creating innovative solutions for improving security and business performance. As a network technology company and industry leader, we offer solutions in video surveillance, access control, intercom, and audio systems, enhanced by intelligent analytics applications.
With around 5000 committed employees in over 50 countries, we collaborate with partners worldwide. Together, we thrive in our friendly, open, and collaborative culture and inspire each other to think beyond the expected. United by our commitment to inclusion, diversity, and sustainability, we consistently seek to develop our skills and way of working.
Let´s create a smarter, safer world
For more information about Axis, please visit our website www.axis.com.
Listen to Get To Know Axis – Podcast

title: Senior Systems Engineer/System Architect
description:
### **JOB DESCRIPTION**



Do you have a passion for wireless communication?



Would you prefer a world where everything was connected?



Do you want to take the Internet of Things from a buzzword to reality?



You now have the chance to work at a Swedish IoT specialist with some



of the most interesting IoT and wireless projects around.



We are looking to strengthen our Systems Engineering team with a senior person that brings experience, energy and drive. You will be part of our systems engineering team where we develop complete system designs for our customer projects. Our work focuses on gathering/documenting systems requirements and the development of a system architecture that meets those requirements.



We set the system topology and functional split between system nodes (e.g., device/gate way/cloud) and we define the HW and SW architecture of the various system nodes. Our work involves wired and wireless connectivity, ACPU/MCU selection, sensors, power management, Cameras and image processing and Audio systems and more. We develop systems with edge AI as well as ML in the back end.



A typical project can be anything from a connected wearable device with sensors to large drones flying at the speed of Mach 1.



As Sigma Connectivity WSI is a design house, we work mostly with projects that are developed in-house. In other words, most of the work is undertaken in our office in Kista where you have access to labs and the full knowledge of the team. We also have access to the competence and labs in our Lund office.



Some examples of work would be:


* Together with the customer set the System Requirements for the product/system.
* Develop system architecture to meet those system requirements
* Define performance requirements on AI-accelerators, CPU/DSP etc,
* Select key components (MCU/CPU, Radio transceivers, AI-accelerator, sensors etc.
* Define requirements for components to be selected during the development (Camera modules, microphones, Speakers, actuators etc).
* Calculate power budget and select suitable battery capacity and technology for the application.
* More…


We are a team of system architects, continuously advancing our skills and knowledge. We learn from each other, but we also constantly educate ourselves from training, media, literature, vendors and of course from our customers. We are curious and eager to learn more about more.



**About Sigma Connectivity WSI**



Sigma Connectivity WSI – supports companies in developing and industrializing their products within Internet of Things and advanced radio.



Since 2002 we have been making things Wireless by WSI™.



The team has long experience of delivering complex projects and mobile products. We provide a flexible resource that takes a product from idea to volume production. Our experienced in-house team ensures quality every step of the way. Since autumn 2020, we are owned by and a part of the Sigma Connectivity Group, a global tech house with its headquarters in Lund, Sweden.


### **BASIC QUALIFICATIONS**



**Must have:**



* Master of Science degree or equivalent experience
* At least 5 years’ experience from working in the tech business.
* Experience in doing system design
* An understanding of system partitioning and how to judge what function to place where.
* Solid understanding of MCUs/CPUs and other processing devices such as co-processors
* Good understanding of various RF-protocols such as BT/BLE, WLAN, Thread and an understanding of different topologies (Point-to-Point, Point-to-multi-point, mech…).
* Experience from HW and/or SW development.
* An understanding of Cyber Security and how to mitigate various risks.
* You are verbal and like to meet customers.
* You are a team player, but you can also work independently with support from the team.
* You need to be curious!


**Good to have:**



Experience in the following areas:


* Experience in cellular connectivity such as LTE and 5G.
* Experience in Computer Vision and AI based Audio processing.
* Cameras and Vision systems
* Audio systems
* Thermal simulation
* Regulatory compliance

### **PREFERRED ADDITIONAL SKILLS, PERSONAL TRAITS AND EXPERIENCE**



This is you


You are curious about different technologies and are always striving to learn more.



You think in “systems” rather than of “devices”.



You can take ownership and work independently and at the same time being a team member, coach, and grow people around you.



As a systems architect you set the direction for the rest of the development team.



You are flexible and can change direction in case new requirements appear or requirements are changed.



You are fluent in English, written and spoken.



You have a B.Sc. or M.Sc. in engineering. Alternatively, you have gained



similar knowledge from work experience, in the fields of embedded systems,



electronics, or systems design.



We put great emphasis on your attitude and eagerness to learn!


### **WE OFFER**


* An international working environment
* Opportunity to develop cutting edge technology for market leaders and some of the most demanding customers
* Extensive hardware and software knowledge and all the equipment to build and test complete products and solutions
* Working on a project basis, promoting competence development
* Being part of a wonderful and experienced team where you will never work alone.
* The Sigma Connectivity company culture.


Sigma Connectivity WSI is a unique consultant company offering:


* Focus on connectivity, and the possibility to work for some of the most demanding connectivity customers available with highly motivated and skilled developers and testers in the team.
* Access to cutting-edge technology through our close cooperation with component vendors, platform vendors and 3rd party companies.
* A culture based on sharing experiences and knowledge. We will encourage you to develop and grow your competence and skills with new challenges.
* Many great colleagues, passionate about all the cool devices we build, all being inventors committed to having fun while getting things done.
* An environment with systems, hardware and software knowledge as well as all the equipment to build and test complete products in-house.
* Team activities with WSI colleagues,
* An including culture, where we support each other. By joining the Sigma Connectivity WSI family you will indeed never be alone!

We work both with a tech-house service executing the customers’ assignments in-house, as well as an engineering service where our work resides in the customer's location. Our experienced team ensures quality every step of the way.



This position concerns the tech-house, where we work mostly with projects that are developed in-house. In other words, work is undertaken in our office in Kista where you have access to the full knowledge of the team.

Lars Wattsgård,

title: Emerging Enterprise Account Executive, Nordics
description:
SLSQ326R4



Want to help solve the world's toughest problems with data and AI? This is what we do every day at Databricks.



Databricks operates at the leading edge of the Data and AI space. Our customers turn to us to lead the accelerated innovation their businesses need to gain first-mover advantage in today's ultra-competitive landscape.



Reporting to the Regional Sales Manager, as an Emerging Enterprise Account Executive at Databricks, you come with relevant experience selling to mid-market accounts in the Nordics. As a successful candidate you are a self-starter who understands the consumption sales process. You know how to sell innovation and value to existing customers, identify new use cases and grow consumption and can guide deals forward to compress decision cycles. You love understanding a product in-depth and are passionate about communicating its value to customers and partners. You will be offered huge potential for career progression with the pace of the team's growth.

  

**The impact you will have:**


* Assess your territory and develop a successful execution strategy
* Drive quarter-on-quarter consumption growth in existing accounts
* Exceed activity and quarterly revenue targets
* Track all customer details including use case, purchase time frames, next steps, and forecasting in Salesforce
* Identify new use case opportunities and showcase value to existing customers
* Promote the value of the Databricks' Data Intelligence Platform
* Ensure 100% satisfaction among all customers


**What we look for:**


* Understanding of the data platform and cloud ecosystems
* Some exposure to the software industry and some basic concepts of selling SaaS, Data and Business Value
* Experience growing consumption and closing commit deals in a direct sales role
* Basic understanding on how to research company information and identifying key stakeholders
* General understanding of MEDDPICC
* Experience exceeding sales targets/quotas
* Bachelor's Degree or relevant work experience
* Fluency in English is required, fluency in Swedish is preferred

**About Databricks**



Databricks is the data and AI company. More than 10,000 organizations worldwide — including Comcast, Condé Nast, Grammarly, and over 50% of the Fortune 500 — rely on the Databricks Data Intelligence Platform to unify and democratize data, analytics and AI. Databricks is headquartered in San Francisco, with offices around the globe and was founded by the original creators of Lakehouse, Apache Spark™, Delta Lake and MLflow. To learn more, follow Databricks on Twitter, LinkedIn and Facebook.  

  

**Benefits**  

  

At Databricks, we strive to provide comprehensive benefits and perks that meet the needs of all of our employees. For specific details on the benefits offered in your region, please visit https://www.mybenefitsnow.com/databricks.

  

**Our Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion**



At Databricks, we are committed to fostering a diverse and inclusive culture where everyone can excel. We take great care to ensure that our hiring practices are inclusive and meet equal employment opportunity standards. Individuals looking for employment at Databricks are considered without regard to age, color, disability, ethnicity, family or marital status, gender identity or expression, language, national origin, physical and mental ability, political affiliation, race, religion, sexual orientation, socio-economic status, veteran status, and other protected characteristics.


**Compliance**



If access to export-controlled technology or source code is required for performance of job duties, it is within Employer's discretion whether to apply for a U.S. government license for such positions, and Employer may decline to proceed with an applicant on this basis alone.

title: Account Executive, Enterprise | NORDICS
description:
**Who we are is what we do.**


Deel is the all-in-one payroll and HR platform for global teams. Our vision is to unlock global opportunity for every person, team, and business. Built for the way the world works today, Deel combines HRIS, payroll, compliance, benefits, performance, and equipment management into one seamless platform. With AI-powered tools and a fully owned payroll infrastructure, Deel supports every worker type in 100+ countries—helping businesses scale smarter, faster, and more compliantly.


Among the largest globally distributed companies in the world, our team of 5,000 spans more than 100 countries, speaks 74 languages, and brings a connected and dynamic culture that drives continuous learning and innovation for our customers.

**Why should you be part of our success story?**


As the fastest-growing Software as a Service (SaaS) company in history, Deel is transforming how global talent connects with world-class companies – breaking down borders that have traditionally limited both hiring and career opportunities. We're not just building software; we're creating the infrastructure for the future of work, enabling a more diverse and inclusive global economy. In 2024 alone, we paid $11.2 billion to workers in nearly 100 currencies and provided healthcare and benefits to workers in 109 countries—ensuring people get paid and protected, no matter where they are.


Our momentum is reflected in our achievements and customer satisfaction: CNBC Disruptor 50, Forbes Cloud 100, Deloitte Fast 500, and repeated recognition on Y Combinator’s top companies list – all while maintaining a 4.83 average rating from 15,000 reviews across G2, Trustpilot, Captera, Apple and Google.


Your experience at Deel will be a career accelerator. At the forefront of the global work revolution, you'll tackle complex challenges that impact millions of people's working lives. With our momentum—backed by a $12 billion valuation and $800 million in Annual Recurring Revenue (ARR) in just over five years—you'll drive meaningful impact while building expertise that makes you a sought-after leader in the transformation of global work.

**Summary**


The Account Executive, ENT, is responsible for driving sales growth by building and nurturing relationships with large, strategic clients. This role focuses on understanding client needs, presenting tailored solutions, and negotiating contracts to secure new business and expand existing accounts. Working alongside other sales team members, marketing professionals, and customer success teams, this role is essential for driving significant revenue and positioning the organization as a trusted partner in the industry.

**Responsibilities**

* Own a targeted account list and develop account plans for winning business with companies between 2,000+ employees
* Meet or exceed monthly, quarterly and yearly revenue targets
* Continually develop a robust sales pipeline through individual outreach, collaborating with your sales development rep, and managing inbound prospects
* Navigate an enterprise to map stakeholders, build champions, generate buy-in and close deals with C-Level decision makers
* The instincts to recognize organizational financial and behavioral structures and obstacles
* Keep Salesforce up to date with customer information, forecasts, and pipeline data so we can learn more about our business and our sales process

**Qualifications**

* 4+ years selling in the Enterprise segment
* A track record of developing a greenfield territory, adding net new logos in an Enterprise software role
* Demonstrated ability to build relationships with Fortune 5000 senior line-of-business executives
* Hunter mentality with solid Sales DNA and appetite for continual learning
* Desire to work for a fast-paced startup and take on increasing levels of responsibility
* Fluent in English and Swedish OR Finnish

**Total Rewards**


Our workforce deserves fair and competitive pay that meets them where they are. With scalable benefits, rewards, and perks, our total rewards programs reflect our commitment to inclusivity and access for all.

**Some things you’ll enjoy**

* Stock grant opportunities dependent on your role, employment status and location
* Additional perks and benefits based on your employment status and country
* The flexibility of remote work, including optional WeWork access


At Deel, we’re an equal-opportunity employer that values diversity and positively encourage applications from suitably qualified and eligible candidates regardless of race, religion, sex, national origin, gender, sexual orientation, age, marital status, veteran status, disability status, pregnancy or maternity or other applicable legally protected characteristics.

*Unless otherwise agreed, we will communicate with job applicants using Deel-specific emails, which include @**deel.com* *and other acquired company emails like @**payspace.com* *and @**paygroup.com**. You can view the most up-to-date job listings at Deel by visiting**our careers page**.*  

  

*Deel is an equal-opportunity employer and is committed to cultivating a diverse and inclusive workplace that reflects different abilities, backgrounds, beliefs, experiences, identities and perspectives.*  

  

*Deel will provide accommodation on request throughout the recruitment, selection and assessment process for applicants with disabilities. If you require accommodation, please inform our Talent Acquisition Team at recruiting@deel.com of the nature of the accommodation that you may require, to ensure your equal participation.*


We use Covey as part of our hiring and/or promotional processes. As part of the evaluation process, we provide Covey with job requirements and candidate-submitted applications. Certain features of the platform may qualify it as an Automated Employment Decision Tool (AEDT) under applicable regulations. For positions in New York City, our use of Covey complies with NYC Local Law 144.


We began using Covey Scout for Inbound on March 30, 2025.


For more information about our data protection practices, please visit our Privacy Policy. You can review the independent bias audit report covering our use of Covey here: https://getcovey.com/nyc-local-law-144
